Reviews.Title: Love the tv!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hull
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product since it was 179$ the cheapest led tv I came across that was new. You do have to install the bezel comes with good instructions and a screwdriver. The Ocosmo has a one year limited warranty so I recommend buying additional tv coverage. Sound is fine the picture is good , I'm almost 9 months pregnant and had 0 trouble installing and setting up this unit. I would recommend this product they seem to be a decent new tv company. Also the tv is roku ready.As for people complaining about the sound quality, you can adjust the sound and picture with your remote. I switched the sound to a and found that fixed that problem for me. There are about 4 settings for picture and sound adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Kisha
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and undamaged. Picture is great as well as the sound!! This brand isnt listed so use the same remote codes as Sony...fyi

Reviews.Title: Great for Gamers
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: This a great Tv for gamers, like me, but I don't really care about the sound like everyone says about it because i only use my headsets for listening.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Boyd
Reviews.Content: I got this for $119 on cyber Monday. I wasn't expecting much, but I did read the reviews before I bought it. So here we go:Pros:It weighs almost nothing.It showed up way before I expected it to. Yay!I had it up and going with no effort as far as turning it on, getting my xbox plugged in. 30 seconds tops, but I don't have cable tv or anything, so I don't know how it goes with that.I was expecting the sound to be horrible from some of the posts I had read, but it's not. Sure, it's a little tinny. But this is a $119 tv, so I am not complaining at all. If you're looking for movie theater quality sound, buy a name brand instead of complaining about a really cheap tv. You do tend to get what you pay for, whiners.It comes with a little magnetic screw driver to use on the con listed below.Cons:The stand itself is crap. Be prepared to wrestle with the screws to put it together. It's also a little wobbly despite my best efforts, but I don't plan on actually touching the tv. So it's not a deal breaker.All in all, I'd buy it again. And again. Price means more to me than quality when it comes to a tv, so from that perspective: WIN!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at Black Friday Price Year-Round
Reviews.Author: James Burke
Reviews.Content: Great value, sound is decent, and picture is excellent for the price. Paid $300 for an LG not even a year ago (the one compared to $228) and ended up spending close to $400 with tax & warranty... AND the TV had limited inputs and NO AUDIO out. So once the speakers go, if I don't reroute all the inputs through a receiver I am out of luck.Pros:Cost (plus no tax)Quality (not grainy, bulky, or cheap feeling like a Proscan from Best Buy)Features (USB, HDMI, VGA, et cetera)1080/720 makes no difference at over 10 ft from the source of a 32" TV, the fidelity of the TV comes into play, and the oCOSMO is more than capable (see [...]<$9/year Energy Star RatingEven on energy saving mode the reception is bright and clear with a wall of open windows/balcony doors directly to the sideThe remote!  Id est the layout (can adjust sound, picture, aspect, and color without searching for buttons) and over all ease of useCons:Sound comes out a little cheap but have many alternatives that make it easy to re-routeThe over all value and quality was so overwhelming I purchased one for the Living Room (great viewing angle and reception even from the kitchen 30+ feet away - I can even hear the TV clearly on low volume from up stairs) and another for the spare bed room.Amazon has done it again!

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: arnett
Reviews.Content: for the price it is a good second tv sound isnt that good but the color is good enjoy it would get one for the guest room

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Tom Boudreau
Reviews.Content: It was a relatively good picture for 720p display, but the sound quality was poor, like that of a small, grainy speaker. I only paid $180 for it, and for that price and size, I'm happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: charla's stuff
Reviews.Content: Picture is crystal clear, colors great, easy to set up and control. Similar quality to a Sony. Glad I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: WHAT A BUNCH OF WINERS!! IT HAS BAD SOUND. BOO WOO!!..REALLY???
Reviews.Author: MUSICMAN "takemymusic"
Reviews.Content: People, you just purchase an HDTV 32" for $119.00-$179.00 with free shipping and then complain about it's sound?? Really?? Adjust the settings people!! Of course,it should have  two 15" sub-woofers in a 4" wide frame? Buy a sound bar ,better yet get up in your attic and get down your tower speakers you used with your HI-FI system from the 70's.Get real. This  tv puts out an exceptional quality picture and the sound is fine with some adjustments. BUT I understand ,,,you have to lift up that heavy remote and adjust some settings,,,,,,,,,,I know Amazon did not state this in the description and  it's an extremely difficult task  to adjust a Tv in a fast paced world we live in.Give it a rating it deserves!! This is a great Tv for the price!!  MERRY CHRISTMAS TO ALL!!

Reviews.Title: Excellant bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: redink
Reviews.Content: TV is very light and if you want to wall mount it you only need a low cost mount. Contrary to other reports, I found the sound very good for a bedroom TV. Remote is well thought out. Very hard to beat price!

Reviews.Title: Great for a bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Got the tv for my daughters room and it is absolutely perfect for her. If you are considering this for your living room I would look elsewhere as it is NOT a top quality flat screen. Picture is fine, but sound quality leaves you wanting more. Highly suggested for a great value bedroom television

Reviews.Title: Wow! For the price!
Reviews.Author: Happy Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: This tv is a great deal! I needed an extra guest room tv.  To get a 32 inch HDTV for $180 is pretty amazing. The picture is terrific (much better than 32 inch Vizio HDTV that I have in another guest room).  As others have said, the sound is not very loud and lacks depth, but unlike my Vizio, it is in no way "tinny".  The remote is excellent - the setups and prompts are well designed.  It works well with the Roku and my ipad, the special MHL Hdmi is great.  Also, I didn't realize that the remote has been specifically designed to use with the Roku streaming stick. I will definitely use this brand as my go to for low price/good quality.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jason Legacy
Reviews.Content: Its a nice set. Its roku ready and has a port to plug my tablet in (mhl?) I just need to buy the mini usb to hdmi cable. I didnt realize that this was roku ready until I got it. I bought a roku box too so that even better. You may want to get a universal remote though because this one is kinda cheap

Reviews.Title: Good Buy For The Price
Reviews.Author: Louis J.
Reviews.Content: The sound goes loud than soft on occasion.  Picture quality isn't the best.  Good buy for the money, though.  I wouldn't recommend it for the main tv, but good for that spare room.

Reviews.Title: Great deal !!!
Reviews.Author: Robert J Silva
Reviews.Content: Works great. Excellent super sharp picture.Latest design with very small frame around screen.This is the best bang for the buck.If need another TV this is the one I'll get.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from the good ol set.
Reviews.Author: Jack Hughes
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture, great sound and the perfect gift for the new father-in-law. Beautiful gloss finish. HDMI cable input is the perfect upgrade to an everyday TV experience with 720P.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "A person with an ear."
Reviews.Content: Had a little trouble assembling the base but I am mechanically challenged. Color is good, sound is good, good value.

Reviews.Title: Considering returning
Reviews.Author: Coach Lasher
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much for the price, but the picture is poor and the sound is even worse.  Had to buy a sound bar just to make it listenable.  Considering returning it.Edit:9/27/13  I did end up returning it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Westbrook
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv for a bedroom. It works great and sounds good too! The build quality is fair for the price but doesn't compare to our Samsung HDTV.  However, this one was $800.00 cheaper than the Samsung and for the price it is fantastic!  The picture quality is clear and crisp and the color renditions are great.  If you are in the market for a quality budget tv this is it! Grab it now!!!

Reviews.Title: Ok, not great
Reviews.Author: Travis H
Reviews.Content: This truly is one of those cases where you get what you pay for.  At a certain point it might be worth saving up another 100-150 dollars to get to the next "tier" in TV quality.  This TV borders on that point.  On the one hand, the price is great.  But there are some downsides:The picture quality is average, especially on fast moving shows like sporting events.  Given the 60hz refresh rate its to be expected, but our other TV (Panasonic) with the same refresh rate is quite a bit better.The sound quality is not good.  I ended up getting a set of external computer speakers and plugging them into the headphone jack.  It sounds much better, but a bit of a hassle.The remote control is not good either.  The layout is fine, but it just doesn't work very well.  The remote has to be pointing exactly at the IR sensor on the TV or nothing happens.  I've tried new batteries and it still does not have a very wide IR range, even if you're a couple of degrees off from the IR sensor, it will not recognize the command.  I've never experience a remote that has to be that accurate to work properly.Pluses:Physically the design of the TV is pretty good.  Its pretty light and has a sleek look to it.PriceSo the TV works, just don't expect superior quality.  I would only use this as a secondary TV in a bedroom or guest room.  If not for the price, It would have been a 2 star product.UPDATE - The TV has started to display "noise" and jaggy lines.  This has started within the last week.  Contacted Ocosmo support.  Will keep this review updated based on their response.UPDATE 2 - Submitted RMA request on January 23rd.  As of today, February 6th, have not yet received the box to ship the TV.  I've received the shipping label via email, but no box.  The TV is currently unwatchable due to the issues with the picture.  If I don't get a response soon, I'll update the review accordingly.

Reviews.Title: Way better than a Funai .
Reviews.Author: Velderve
Reviews.Content: Good price, reads 32 sticks and plays mp3, default sound settings should be changed to get a better quality, roku  ready friendly menu.

Reviews.Title: great picture for price
Reviews.Author: dealseeker
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, price is even better. Sound is tinny and not so great.  will have to get a sound bar but for the price, well worth it!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive television for a very small, quiet room
Reviews.Author: Paul Rogers
Reviews.Content: The oCosmo television has a nice picture, but the sound is inadequate even in a bedroom. With the volume turned to maximum level, we have difficulty hearing and distortion is introduced in the bass region. I purchased a sound bar, but this added only a little more bass, but no significant volume.

Reviews.Title: Best deal ever!
Reviews.Author: Dina
Reviews.Content: I just received this tv and I have to say I love it. The deal I got was amazing. The picture is perfect. The sound is great. I'm not sure what the negative reviews on the sound are about. I have no issues what so ever. Great large size for a bedroom or living room!

Reviews.Title: Distracting light bleed turned anticipation into disappointment
Reviews.Author: Whedon
Reviews.Content: ******* UPDATED REVIEW 12/7/13 *******Assembled the replacement unit upon receiving it last night and my two biggest problems with the TV have been resolved/minimized. The backlight bleed is drastically reduced. Instead of having the amber light waves at the bottom of the screen distracting from the picture, there is now minimal light bleed in a couple of places that is nearly imperceptible while watching TV. This I can live with and does not distract from the programming. The second biggest problem was the constant loud hum/buzz that the unit gave off, which was extremely annoying when the TV was muted or idle. The replacement unit does not have this infuriating buzzing. I will be upping my original 2 star review, as I feel the replacement unit is a decent buy for a $120 bedroom TV.The weirdest thing about the replacement unit is that the ports are moved around. Two tv's, 3 days apart, and the side ports and back ports are almost completely different. New TV has the hdmi ports on the side instead of the composite/component/audio out, which are now at the back where the hdmi's were on the first unit. Weird, but they are all accounted for.UPDATED PROS & CONSPros:- Sound is great in a small bedroom. I assumed I'd need a soundbar from reading the other reviews, but in my small space I ended up having to turn the volume down quite a bit from the factory set volume.- They send you a screwdriver to put the stand together and a microfiber cloth to clean your fingerprints off once you're done. Nice touch.- The neck that joins the TV to the base swivels to change the viewing angle. Nice! (photo added)- Picture is perfectly good, especially for a bedroom TV, with some slight backlight bleed in a couple spots that is nearly imperceptible once a program starts playing.Cons:- Remote control is huge and way too busy, entirely too much going on. If you don't have a Roku Streaming Stick then all those Roku buttons on the oCosmo remote just add to the remote clutter. I have a Roku hooked up to it, but not a Roku stick so the Roku controls don't work (unless I'm missing something). If you don't have a soundbar, you've got more remote clutter. The switch input button is oddly placed as well. (photo added)- Input/Source can't be changed by pressing Source repeatedly which scrolls through the available inputs until you land on the one needed. On this remote you must press Source to open the list, then find the arrow keys to move up and down the list then Enter to choose one. Minor quibble, but in the dark especially, having one button to switch inputs is so much easier.- Getting the screws in to attach the neck to the base was a struggle and required some strength to get them flush. Once assembled, the stand feels very cheap, not as sturdy as I'd prefer, but i'm going to trust the oCosmo engineers that it will hold up.- On the replacement unit, the aux cable connection has been moved to a new location, and unfortunately this new location makes screwing in the cable connection extremely awkward and difficult. There is a lip beneath the male connector that doesn't allow the female connector to be screwed in flush without bending the extremely stiff cable wire to try to line up the male/female. It really took some elbow grease and patience to get manhandle it into position enough to get the threads lined up. This was an engineering fail in my opinion.******* ORIGINAL REVIEW 12/4/13 *******I was excited, I was impressed, then I was sooo disappointed. I like to be a cheerleader for brands I've never heard of. Case in point, you can see my review from 2 years ago for my well loved living room TV (brand name TCL, what the heck is TCL?) here on Amazon. Unfortunately, I believe I've gotten a bad apple from oCosmo.Unboxed my 32" oCosmo, laid out all the parts and followed the Quick Start Guide to put the stand together and attach it to my TV. The process was 9 screws, and they even included the screwdriver. Took me about 30 minutes in total because I'm a weakling and ran into some difficulty attaching the neck to the stand.TV was ready to go and I powered it on and waited about 10 minutes for the channel scan to complete. But 'oh oh', something is wrong. There is so much light bleeding through at bottom of the screen I absolutely cannot focus on what's happening in the movie/tv show that's playing. Let me momentarily bring up my TCL tv again to add some context. My TCL has slight light bleed from the top right and top left corners. This bleed is only when the screen is solid black, such as when the screen saver is active, and does not affect the picture when I'm watching a program. In contrast, the oCosmo's light bleed is so glaringly distracting that it's all I can look at. When viewing a show in SD or full screen format, if a scene is dark or anyone is wearing black, navy blue, a dark color, the hazy yellow blobs of light in waves/blobs along the bottom of the screen are intensified. When viewing an HD movie in letterbox, the hazy waves of amber light beneath the program are equally distracting.I watched TV on the oCosmo for about an hour, wondering if I could just learn to live with it, and I realize that no, I really cannot deal with all those yellow blobs on or under my shows. I have no idea how to return a TV, but I'm going to try to get a replacement and will update my review once I do so.Pros (on first impression):- Sound is great in a small bedroom. I assumed I'd need a soundbar from reading the other reviews, but in my small space I ended up having to turn the volume down quite a bit from the factory set volume.- They send you a screwdriver to put the stand together and a microfiber cloth to clean your fingerprints off once you're done. Nice touch.- The neck that joins the TV to the base swivels to change the viewing angle. Nice! (photo added)Cons (on first impression):- Light bleed is ridiculously distracting. (photo added)- Remote control is way too busy, entirely too much going on. If you don't have a Roku Streaming Stick then all those Roku buttons on the oCosmo remote just add to the remote clutter. I have a Roku hooked up to it, but not a stick so the Roku controls don't work (unless I'm missing something). If you don't have a soundbar, you've got more remote clutter. The switch input button is oddly placed as well. (photo added)- Stand feels very cheap, not as sturdy as I'd prefer. I'm going to trust the oCosmo engineers that it will hold up.- Constant hum/buzz from the unit when powered on; this is only obvious when the tv is muted or idle, but my other two tv's don't have this annoying hum.

Reviews.Title: Wow Who would haved Guessed?
Reviews.Author: G. M. Carey
Reviews.Content: For a Product name that scared me oCosmo and the only thing I could think of was Cosmo Topper from the TV show back in the late 50"s, I was really surprised and Very happy with my purchase. This TV works great especially for the price and has all the bells and whistles on it. A real Bargain!

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: Chris J. Thompson "ChrisJames"
Reviews.Content: i was very hesitant, on purchasing this as its a brand i never heard of, but you know what, so far tv works great, the picture is amazing on the xbox, the sound it could be better but, thats what a stereo is for, (you cant get a slim tv with badass speakers)the price was good for a 32inch will do for my pc and xbox..

Reviews.Title: Broke after 6 weeks.
Reviews.Author: s.hopper
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV from Amazon in mid December at a great price.  After 6 weeks it went black while we were watching it and no longer works.  We've tried contacting the customer service phone number on the warranty, and the customer service on line chat.  Both are off line.

Reviews.Title: I went with two of them...
Reviews.Author: Alan Glasco
Reviews.Content: I didn't really plan to buy another HDTV but what caught my eye was the low price with the high customer rating.  I read the reviews and was a little apprehensive because of the sound complaints.  I went ahead and ordered 2 sets.  I was buying them to hang in my bedroom & the guest room.  I figured if the sound didn't work out that I would just use an extra sound bar I had laying around & my guest would just have to put up what they got.  The sets came I took swing-out hangers and hung them in the bedrooms.  They both are swung out at 45 degree angles.  I got them auto programed to cable, tested them out and this is what I found.◘ The sound was adequate & I had no trouble understanding what was being said. (I have some loss of hearing and ringing in the ears).  Keep in mind that this is in my medium sized bedrooms & my viewing distance is about 8 foot.  I decided that I didn't need an optional sound source.◘ The picture's really surprised me with the good colors & brightness.  The viewing angle on the TV was much better then my larger Samsung or Sharp TV's.  I didn't see any light bleed & not one dead pixel on either set.◘ You do need line of site for the remote.  I have no trouble with this as I do have line of site but keep this in mind.I won't cover all the other options or lack of options as others have done a good job of that.  I would purchase this TV again if needed.  I give this TV a 5 star rating even with the limitations of the remote signal.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, sound not so much.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the price, I am really impressed with the TV. Bright, crisp picture. Motion is even smooth. This is our first flat screen, I understand that all flat screen speakers sound bad so cannot really hold it against the brand. We added a cheap soundbar to the tv and it made all the difference. Would definitely buy again!

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Marimi L Taylor
Reviews.Content: Bought it on a black friday sale.  The Picture looks great.  The sound is a little hollow but it's fixable with a sound bar.  The only real drawback is getting the remote codes for universal remotes.PS.  I tried "Sony" codes and one of the work.Great Buy for the Black Friday Price

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Jessica R.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase. I use this TV in my bedroom and it works great. I have not had any issues with the sound or picture.

Reviews.Title: oCosmo 32 inch 720p LED TV
Reviews.Author: Joe D.
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased the oCosmo 32 inch LED TV from Amazon.com. Very happy with the tv. Actually more than I thought it would be. Highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Save Money and Buy it
Reviews.Author: disco
Reviews.Content: Buy it! No one can beat the price. I'm happy with it and so will you. My only regret is not buying the 40 inch instead. 32 inch is too small for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: Alias
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the money. The swivel stand has to be assembled, but that was no problem. The remote is a full remote with buttons for DVD player, etc., and it's easy to navigate through. Picture quality is excellent, but that often depends on your provider's service. The only drawback is the sound isn't quite as good as the more expensive TV's, but it's every bit as good as any CRT (tube) TV that I've ever owned. Once I tweaked the sound with the remote menu it sounded much better, but if too much bass is added there's a slight distortion (common with cheap speakers). This is an LED and I also have an LCD and I can't tell the difference and to be honest, I really don't know what the real difference is between an LED or LCD anyways. This TV has all the options for picture and sound quality plus all the ports for hooking up anything you'd like to add to the TV including Roku. Ohhhh, if there was one minor complaint, it's where the cable port is located. It was a little difficult to screw in the cable because of where it's located on the back underside of the TV. There's not much room for your fingers to tighten the connection and I had to get a pair of pliers to complete the tightening of it due to not being able to get my fingers in there to grasp it tight enough. Other than that, I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one of these TV's. I had never heard of oCosmo before and right after placing my order I wondered if I made the right choice considering an unknown name and low price, but I was pleasantly surprised at what a great purchase this turned out to be. I'll certainly keep this brand in mind for future purchases.UPDATE: I've now had the TV for just under two weeks and I'd still highly recommend it and I would have no hesitation in buying another one. However with that said, what I have noticed since now owning it is that the clock is fast. Really fast. It gains about five minutes per day which is frustrating and also the AM/PM doesn't work and I'm unable to set it properly. Not a real deal breaker, just a minor irritation. The sound quality was poor as so many other reviewers mentioned, but I added some small external computer speakers and the sound quality improved dramatically. I would recommend doing that if you're not satisfied with the sound. Other than the clock issue I'm still very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: For the Price I'm Very Happy With It.  Great PC Monitor!
Reviews.Author: R. Merz
Reviews.Content: Purchased this during cyber Monday sale.  I've had it for about a week now.  It's mainly being used as a computer monitor.  I do have my Apple TV hook to it as well.  I am very happy with the picture quality.  I tweaked some of the settings a little to obtain the best picture possible.  Right out of the box it was a little blue for my liking.The speakers are a bit on the "tin can" side but that's probably the complaint I read about the most.  They are doable however.  When I'm using it as a PC monitor I just use the speakers for my PC anyway.As a computer monitor it's been working great.  Since we don't have cable we mainly watch Hulu and Netflix, which both look great on this TV.  I'm probably going to buy a cheap OTA antenna to get local channels as well.I only have two complaints so far:1: Assembling it.  The screws that attach the base to the monitor seem to go in kind of hard.  You really had to work at it.  But then again there are people on the world without clean drinking water so I think I don't have much room to complain about some tough screws :)2: It had 2 dead pixels (not the end of the world)

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Price
Reviews.Author: Ryan Holzkopf
Reviews.Content: For the price I believe I have gotten a great deal! Everything was separately packaged or individually wrapped, much of which was in nice zip lock bags. There was definite care taken for the shipment of this product.DVD's and Digital streaming play wonderfully on this device, though because it is HDTV, if you have a lower quality video, it will show, but that should be expected. I have not tried the MHL port yet for ROKU. The video otherwise for T.V. Cable and Digital OTA is amazing. The audio isn't bad at all, sounds better than most cheaper Flat screen HDTVs I've come across, although having an outside Audio system probably is a good idea if you want to watch  video in excellent quality whether 5.1 or other. If you are looking for a T.V. that delivers great picture, a VGA and sound port, 3 HDMI, 1 AV, 1 YPbPr, and is Smart T.V. capable, and is decently priced. Then this is what you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Normally would not give this TV five stars but when factoring in the price it is a real bargain. I'll start by saying if you want a high end, perfect picture TV don't buy this. If you want something decent that works well price can't be beat. Have read comments about not so good picture and sound. Picture is actually very good. Of course I'm not a TV aficionado nor a gamer who would I'm sure have a different opinion.  What I will say about that was it did take me a lot longer to adjust settings to get picture to look good compared to any other TV I've ever owned. So know in advance actual setup is very quick but tweaking settings can be time consuming. Sound took even longer to adjust settings. Although sound does still sound a bit tinny, I made adjustments that make sound pretty good. I could definitely see how the original sound could be very annoying (reminded me of fingernails on a chalkboard). One adjustment I made that actually helped was that I turned off Surround mode. Don't know why that helped but after making numerous other adjustments that was the last one I needed to fix sound. We have never bought a name brand TV (okay..so I'm frugal) and each one has lasted at least 10 years so am hoping our luck will continue. Can't speak to how reliable this will be but will update if any problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: michael hansen
Reviews.Content: Got it cyber Monday for  $119. Best deal ever! Picture is great, sound is lacking but can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Decent budget TV, only falls short on sound quality.
Reviews.Author: dublox
Reviews.Content: Picked this up for 119.00 on cyber monday. For the price it's great.Default sound settings are very poor, there is almost no bass. First thing I did was turn the bass setting on max. Sounds about 5 times better after I did that.The sound sometimes increases out of the blue and some channels the sound is noticeably higher than others.This TV uses Sony remote codes just as another reviewer mentioned. I bought this tv to replace a Sony I had and I tried my Sony remote for the oCosmo and it worked no problem. This was reassuring since I've never heard of this brand before and I was worried about having to replace the remote at some point.I like to flip through channels fast and I was pleased that this tv allows you to do so. There is very little delay when changing channels. Some cheap tv's have an annoying lag while changing channels, this one doesn't.The stand for this tv swivels from side to side, which is nice if your not going to mount in on the wall. The remote is very thin and cheap feeling, glad I can use my old Sony remote instead. Tv settings are easy to navigate through and well laid out. Adding and deleting channels is also easy.Overall, I happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Pixel out upon setup
Reviews.Author: Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Just received the product today. Opened, nicely packaged. Upon setup I noticed a green dot on the tv. Obvious a pixel is out. I will be returning of course and will hope the seller makes this right. Will provide update upon receipt of new product but two strikes and you're out Ocosmo. Here's to hoping.Update 12/5/2013 - Amazon has already informed me that they are sending a replacement. Should receive it in the next few days. Upon receipt of the replacement, will confirm it works and return the original. Hopefully we are not returning two TV's on Saturday.Update 12/7/2013 - Upgraded from 2 stars to 4 stars. Only 4 stars because of the inconvenience, however, 5 stars had it not been for having to return the original. I received the new tv just a little while ago and set it up immediately. The picture was perfect this time. I'm keeping this one. The original is all packed up and will be dropped off at my local UPS. I'm glad I did the return instead of full on reimbursement. I wanted to give this manufacturer a second chance and I'm glad I did. I look forward to dozing off at night to this television.

Reviews.Title: the sound quality is not good....
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: it is a good tv if you are not a hd freak. i do not car about hd and really dont like it much it is a nice kids tv or bedroom tv the sound is a little weird it isn't as full as it should be but other than that i like it

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lucky6302
Reviews.Content: I bought it last black Friday, now after so many months I am still happy with it. Works great and by the way the sound it's just perfect for a bed room.The truth be told, even in the living room we don't rely on Tv for the sound, we have amplifier.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Price!
Reviews.Author: M. Spalding
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture quality in HD or non. Took less than 20 minutes to set up easily. Decent built in speakers. All in all, an impressive quality television in this price range. Perfect for the bedroom. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Bt Wash
Reviews.Content: MY WIFE IS NOT A TV FIEND BUT SHE SAYS THE PICTURE IS THE BEST OUT OF THE 3 TVS THAT WE HAVE

Reviews.Title: Good office TV
Reviews.Author: pete parrott
Reviews.Content: For the price the quality has beengood and the picture excellent. This is the second set sent as the first had some technical faults in the picture. The replacement was handled quickly, professionally and to my complete satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: bad remote control
Reviews.Author: Bassma
Reviews.Content: The remote control is not working farer than 1.5  meter....which is annoying I have to be near yhe TV all the time. .but in total good cheap tv..

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Confusing Assembly
Reviews.Author: LKP
Reviews.Content: It's a great value for a television of this size.  However, assembling the base of the TV is somewhat more complicated than other TV's I have put together in the past.  After you get it together, it's fine, but... it's a bit of work to align is properly.

Reviews.Title: Comment on 32"
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Hines Jr. "Morobi"
Reviews.Content: If you're buying a smaller TV, make sure it is a "smart TV".  Allows you to directly connect to Netflix instantly, as long as you have a Netflix account.  Completely sidesteps the Google Concast, Apple box and other options to watch your movies instantly onlne.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Sharon C.
Reviews.Content: Love the picture and set up was so easy. I don't like the sound at all. Very tight and high pitched. I have tried adjusting the audio but still way too tight. Mostly I like it for what I paid it serves the purpose.

Reviews.Title: great Value
Reviews.Author: Lionel
Reviews.Content: this is a very good TV, Am loving it to date. The only problem I have with my tv is that the sound is very poor and low other than that its an excellent buy and the price was just great!. Delivery was speedy also.  would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price.
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: I have not had any problems with this. Quality is very good and it seems to work really well so far. The only thing I did not like is the volume seems to be very loud when I play xbox games and much lower when I watch TV or use XBox apps, however I think that has very little to do with the TV itself and more to do with the network providers/app developers. For the price, you will find nothing better.

Reviews.Title: A fine television!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Other reviews have found better deals, but at the time I purchased this, it was the cheapest TV with a good rating available, so it's what I went for. It was $190 at the time of my purchase. Great quality, great price, 5-star rating as such!Some tips!Make sure to play with the settings when you hook it up! The picture is very good, and can be adjusted several ways. To mimic a computer monitor, I advise the "Warm" and "Vivid" settings in picture options. Make sure to load a color pallet to see what's best for you!The sound isn't the best, as other reviews are mentioning, but it's not terrible. I recommend the "Soft" setting, since it's lacking in bass. If you're a music enthusiast, make sure you have speakers that you can use instead!

Reviews.Title: Good product, easy set up.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: The television came quickly. Good packaging. Took about 10 minutes to assemble and hook up. The remote is laid out as you would expect. The television has a nice picture and sounds decent. It is not the top of the line, but a good solid unit that works well and looks good. I would buy it again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: All the extras without breaking the bank.
Reviews.Author: Stevil
Reviews.Content: I recently had cable installed only to find out that my perfectly good, yet ancient, tv lacked the ports needed to connect it to modern high def boxes. Rather than rush out to buy the cheapest set I could locate I read the reviews here for this television.  Things that seem to be true usually are but this item is comparable with units twice the price. The picture is crisp and life-like with excellent resolution and it has more than enough hdmi outlets to wire up all of your av gear with space left over.  The only drawback to it are the factory speakers. They are ok but no where near as dazzling as the video aspect is. It's not a huge problem though as the money you'll save over a better known brand will easily pay for a decent sound bar with some cash left over.  I was able to set up a pretty sweet home theater for less than $350, can't go wrong with that.

Reviews.Title: Unknown brand with a great picture
Reviews.Author: retdatlast
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas to put in his workshop.  I didn't want to invest a lot because of the environment in the shop.  I had a small problem getting it to recognize our DirecTv controller.  Called tech support. They were wonderful.  They told me to use Sony model numbers to set up the remote control.  Should we perhaps assume that this is a cheaper Sony TV?  Maybe.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Very suprised
Reviews.Author: crispin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents bedroom to replace the big clunker they had in there. I was not sure what to expect, from this off brand, but I was very surprised that the picture looked great. The sound is not bad, for a small room, and the TV itself is super light.  The Blacks are not super black, but this is not a big problem, because this will be used for watching news or local channels most of the time. Also, since this is a bedroom TV being used by older adults, the volume will not be set full blast. My experience with flat screens is that they almost always have horrible problems with volume, but not this one. This actually sounds good at low - mid volume. I bought this while it was on sale for Christmas, $128 Is a bargain + the Amazon prime free 2 day shipping.  In conclusion. This is a great TV at a Great price that made for a Great gift.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the low price
Reviews.Author: Gary Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. No problems with sound as others have indicated.Just change the settings to suit how high you want it.

Reviews.Title: Screen Size + Price + Resolution =  Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "vampire8u"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a very good price/performance ratio. Looks great with our new Roku as Amazon HD videos are only 720p anyway. Regarding the terrible sound the TV puts out when you first get it, go to the sound menu and either take it off "standard" or raise the bass to at least 0. For some reason the "standard" setting is -7 or -8 on bass and that pretty much makes it sound terrible and tinny as people have noticed right out of the box. Will this thing stand the test of time? Only one way to find out.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony F
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our kids for Christmas since the old one broke.  Didn't think it was going to be a flashy thing, but we were pleasantly surprised.  The sound is good for the room it's in (10x10), the picture is great for cartoons or games, its 720p, but has a very clear picture, none the less.  The base is sturdy and attaches securely to the TV.  It has inputs for everything we need.Overall we are very happy with this TV and would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's only a name...
Reviews.Author: Beth S.
Reviews.Content: For the price that I paid, this little OCOSMO has surpassed my expectations! The picture, color, sound quality are all worth the price. In fact, I believe the picture is better than the 55" VIZIO that I own. Also, the remote control has several functions and everything that I need and very easy to use. I would recommend this tv to anyone for a second one in the bedroom, garage, office, or wherever! VERY pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: ajsamuelson
Reviews.Content: I bought it mainly for my son to use it for his PS3 instead of battling with us over our 47" TV.The picture is great. It works well with his PS3 and with Roku. No complaints on sound.I got it on a Black Friday lightning deal, so you can't beat the price and it performs just aswell as any name brand.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and options for less
Reviews.Author: C. Clifford "iknowmore"
Reviews.Content: I took the plunge and can say I am happy so far with my decision. It replaced broken Sony Bravia (shame on you Sony for defective products!) that was the same screen size and has a much smaller and lighter form factor.The good: picture is actually really nice. I played with the color and was able to improve the hues and contrast to satisfactory settings. The MHL port is a really cool feature and will be getting a Roku Streaming Stick shortly so the TV can be made "smart". Remote is good in that it bears resemblance to each and every other remote I've ever used.The bad: speakers are a wee bit anemic but with the equalizer you can get them to increase in loudness. We just plugged it into a stereo anyway.I bought the SquareTrade 3-year warranty just in case for $18! So, worst-case I can send it back to get fixed or replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: JD "SwitchPath"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my sons room, specifically for use with his Xbox 360. For that purpose, it works great. Contrast is great (if a bit high out of the box), and the backlight bleed, though noticeable on black screen compared more expensive units, seems at least uniform across the screen. All in all, Definitely more than I was expecting for the price paid. The headphone jack is also a nice feature, but it would be nice if it was located in a more accessible spot.For those that complain about the sound quality, you're obviously expecting far too much from an FS TV. If you want decent sound, buy a soundbar or get a decent A/V receiver and surround speakers with a powered sub. Another option might be an oCosmo soundbar - I noticed the TV remote has controls specifically for the soundbar they produce. I can't vouch for the sound quality of that unit though as I've never heard it.Pros:* A good value for a sub-$180 32" TV.* Bright picture* Contrast is good - colors really pop, although you may want to reduce this from the factory defaults as it is a bit high* Backlight glow (bleed) seems consistent across the panel, IE no hot-corners, etc* Lots of HDMI (including an MHL port) ports as well as a VGA port and composite/component inputs* Pivoting base* VESA mount compatible* Includes a small Philips-head screw driver for base assembly (although if you have one you will probably want to use a power screwdriver instead)Cons:* Backlight bleed is noticeable if you look for it* Base could be better designed to reduce the number of screws required* Long-term reliability & service is a question as the oCosmo brand is new and relatively unknown (at least to me)

Reviews.Title: Customer service not great
Reviews.Author: K. Bohl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on cyber Monday for $119 shipped... Awesome, right?! Well it was a Christmas present for my 11 yr old daughter, so she opened-- super excited and we hooked everything up. Very easy to assemble, great picture, and I didn't think the sound was bad... However, the tv input kept changing back to HDMI 3 every minute or so no matter what it was on. I tried to call the customer service technicians for OCOSMo but said that it was unavailable. As a side not the remote reaction is VERY delayed, so much so that I thought the batteries were dead. If I could have actually got a technician on the phone and possibly got the input problem fixed, we would have kept the tv though. Since we couldn't get them I called AmAzon customer service and talked to "Allen" and within 5 min he had emailed me a return label and I was off the phone. I'm sure this was just a defective tv so I'm giving it 3 stars...

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the proce
Reviews.Author: RD "RD"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Amazon as part of Black Friday week promotion. The TV comes with a stand, remote and batteries for the remote. TV is easy to set up, picture quality is fine and the sound is good. The kids watch movies, and play Wii on this TV. No  complaints to date.I would not use this as my main TV but as a extra for the kids or a bedroom its fine,

Reviews.Title: Basic TV
Reviews.Author: tomtom
Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the price, at least for the garage. I have another Panasonic LCD, but already some Years old, and this one has clearly a better picture. The style is clean, the remote works as supposed too, and the viewing angle is great.What's rare on any TV, the deliver a real magnetic screwdriver to assemble the stand, have not seen that at any level TV to date.If you need an small, great picture but lower budget TV, this fits the bill just perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Jackie Standridge
Reviews.Content: Got 2 of these, for mine and kids bedrooms.  They are great tv's, only two issues.  The stand is harder to attach than other tv's I own, and like others have said, the sound is not the greatest.  The picture is great, setup is easy, and the menus are super easy to navigate.  It does have custom settings for the sound which helps.  I have a Roku for my bedroom, but I'm going to get the "Roku Stick" for the kids, the remote has the Roku features built in.  End of the day, it's a great unit for the price, but I wouldn't want it as my primary TV.  Sound and stand is only reason I'm not giving it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Thank You So Much!
Reviews.Author: Michael Firman
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my Mother for Christmas and was very doubtful seeing as it was used. Not a problem! Arrived on time in original boxing with original remote. No scratches or nicks. Color is vibrant and amazing. Quality is 100%. Couldn't have asked for more. My mom is very happy. I recommend this product big time. Thank you so much!!!  Will definitely purchase this brand in the future.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Glossy Black)  Get one you wont regret it
Reviews.Author: Alac Grant
Reviews.Content: We picked up the oCosmo 32 inch tv near black friday as a gift and ended up keeping the tv ourselves. While its not high end the picture quality of the set is really quite good. the settings are basic but with a little tweaking we are enjoying this tv and at $99 (bf deal) its a STEAL. Of course thanks to amazon for speedy shipping

Reviews.Title: Picture quit within 10 days, awaiting replacement.
Reviews.Author: Chad Nuttall
Reviews.Content: Gets an extra star just for the ease of getting a replacement no questions asked. The picture didn't want to work out of the box but with some playing with it we got it to work. About a week later it quit and I couldn't get it working. Hopefully it's not a quality issue and ended up being a shipping issue. This tv was shipped all the way to northwestern alaska.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: mrfixit2011
Reviews.Content: Got this on a lightening deal dirt cheap, awesome bedroom tv for the price. Yeah the remote is really finicky and when watching it in a dark room the during dark scenes there is noticeable back light bleeding at the bottom of the screen, the sound is okay but doesn't seem to have alot of dynamic range, lower pitched sounds like conversations can be hard to hear at times and other sounds like music and such seem overly loud, I plan to hook up some speakers I have laying around, but for a bedroom tv at this price its no big deal. Bright clear picture looks great from across the room. If you want a high end tv then buy a samsung or sony, if you want something cheap to watch when you go to bed or put in a kids room, this will work great.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO TV model CE3200
Reviews.Author: Walt Sinkhorn
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time - nice clean lines - however the remote didn't work! Called customer service, they were very helpful. got info to contact oCOSMO direct. They sent out a new remote. It didn't work either. Re-contacted Amazon Customer service. Explained dilemma appears the receiver to remote in the TV is not picking up the signal. Very Helpful service Rep said they will send out a replacement TV. Should receive in a few days. you guys are AMAZING! ! !  Thanks. I will now look at Amazon before I go to the Store.Better Prices, No Crowds, No driving. I never have to leave home. Scary!!!

Reviews.Title: Nothing better on the market for this price
Reviews.Author: Victor Milani
Reviews.Content: Delivery was faster then stated and when I recieved it , it was in good conditionno damage to the box etc.Within minutes, I had it connected an was watchingTV, good picture, decent sound quality, it even came with the screw driver toAttach the base.The remote codes for my satelite dish are the same as Sony.I would highly recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good Price.
Reviews.Author: Ka-Wing Chew
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter and she is in College.  I want a good product at a better price and this fit my budget.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly shocked how impressed I am with the price I paid!
Reviews.Author: Julie A Heaton
Reviews.Content: I needed a T.V. for my office and since I missed the WalMart black Friday deal I was sure I could not find the size for what I could pay…Then I saw this on Amazon.I was sure I would be getting a sub-par, if not poor quality T.V. for the price, but since we have spent too much on our newly adopted kids this Christmas I was willing to take a sacrifice :-)Boy was I shocked!This T.V. is excellent! The set up was simple. The remote easy to use and the color, sharpness…fantastic!All the comments about the sound make no difference to me since it is in a small room, but it is not bad at all.Very happy, Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Is there a warranty on this ...can you send me an exchange??
Reviews.Author: hotrodv8
Reviews.Content: All good but it keeps changing input for the picture...so I have to go to input and change back to where it is suppossedto be coming from...because when it changes input by itself the screen goes blank..Rod

Reviews.Title: slight problem on screen
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Gray
Reviews.Content: There are light marks on the left side and right bottom color. Hope it doesn't get worse or have to send it back. Saw it on first day. It was shipped and received fast. I have ordered products from Nomorerack 2 weeks ago and still have not received my item. I truly love Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: great customer care
Reviews.Author: marsha dillon
Reviews.Content: great picture and perfect size for the room it went into. great customer care, quick delivery. just perfect thank you

Reviews.Title: Perfect spare TV
Reviews.Author: Tammy L
Reviews.Content: Good little Tv. Easy enough to put the stand on. After that you just plug it in and go. No issues with sound or anything else that others seemed to complain about. I gave it a 4 as obviously it doesn't have a million features at that price. But a 4 is outstandign for this TV category. Roku and Ipad plug right in. Don't need to pay the extra $$$ for those smart Tv features to be built in.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV. A lot of bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: A cheap guy
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. The picture is great. The remote is easy to understand but is a little busy. I actually like it so I don't have to go through multiple screens to get to for example a sound menu. I like that it is Roku ready and the remote functionality for it. I have it hooked to a old roku but now I am thinking of getting the Roku stick and eliminate a extra remote. I also use a antenna and it pulls the ota channels in very good. My only gripe is that it does not show the signal strength on ota channels. The pedestal does turn a few degrees which is a nice touch. The sound which many people have complained about, to me is over exaggerated by others. Most flat screen TV's tend to have a tinny sound. It is very acceptable to me and I have no problems with it. In fact I thought it as a little loud. I had it on volume 1 in the bedroom and it was louder than our old TV. I have to adjust the sound settings at night but the remote makes it super simple to do so.I managed to get this on Cyber Monday for $119. It has been fluctuating in price between $169 and $179. Honestly I feel even at $179 this is a great deal. If you looked at some box stores or even on Amazon you will not find a better value for the dollar than this TV. I highly recommend this TV.Note when it is shipped it is in the manufacturers box. Bright white and orange box. So keep this in mind if you have it left on front porch. It uses a 3 prong power cable similar to that of a desktop pc should you need one( it does come with one). I seen someone mention theirs came with a euro plug.As far as the brand, to my knowledge this brand is a re-branded sceptre model.

Reviews.Title: Great Cyber Monday purchase!!
Reviews.Author: J. Remish
Reviews.Content: I along with many others picked this up on Cyber monday for $119 but then got a $10 additional credit by using my mastercard and buying it through my Kindle fire. So for a $109  TV I thought how can I go wrong unless it doesn't work and even then I know Amazon will stand behind their products. So I purchased this TV for my mother to replace a 32 inch 10 year old TV. It arrived by Amazon prime in 2 days by FedEx and was in perfect shape. It took about 10 minutes to unbox and assemble the base to it, extremely simple.Took her 65 lb 32 inch TV off the stand and replaced it with the 14lb new TV and then programmed her comcast remote with the Sony code for this set and she was watching her new set within 20 minutes of the start of the process. The picture quality is good and sharp, colors are good. The sound as almost everyone has mentioned is not so good. I would say the volume on this set is fine. It is the quality of the sound that is lacking. She did not say anything but the sound quality of the old set i took out of her room was so much richer then this new set. However i know from her tastes as long as she can hear it then she is happy with it. The picture quality is vastly improved over what she had, screen was getting lines in it from tube going bad. She thought it was a smaller set and had to show her by measuring both screens that it was the same size screen that she had before , just a much smaller body. Having said that it does have a very small frame to it. The frame is smaller then my 32 inch Westinghouse that I have in my home bedroom. So even I was a little skeptical at first that this was 32 inches. Now if you could get this set for under $150 I would say grab it. Ove that price I would give it a second thought if sound quality was an issue for you. As others have said adding a soundbar or old computer speakers would probably remedy the sound issue. But that adds money to the overall cost and for the total investment it might make sense to look at another set other then this one.

Reviews.Title: A pleasant surprise
Reviews.Author: dibs
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Black Friday for a little over $100. I wasn't expecting much because of how cheap it is even when it's not on sale, but much to my surprise this TV is quite good. It far exceeded my expectations and then some.Pros:- For what it is, the picture quality is superb.- The sound isn't amazing but it's good. If I were using this as my main TV I would definitely invest in a sound bar.- It has a decent amount of inputs which is great.- Once assembled the TV feels pretty solid and swivels fairly easily.- The viewing angles are very good.Cons:(I really can't complain too much and the cons aren't deal-breakers by any means.)-The plastic feels pretty cheap, especially at the base and the swivel mount. While screwing the base to the swivel mount I heard a soft cracking sound. I inspected it and didn't see any cracks but it made me a little nervous. Just be careful when attaching the base to the mount and you should be fine.-The remote is also very cheap feeling/looking and fairly large. It's not a thing of beauty, but again, it's just a remote and no deal-breaker.Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this TV to anyone who's on a budget and doesn't mind 720p.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV especially for the price.
Reviews.Author: sandswoodward
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect. Picture is awesome and the sound is good too.  Don't know why some people wrote reviews complaining about it. People just expect the world for little money. Bought this TV for $169 and a wall mount for 12.99. Couldn't be happier for the results and the price.

Reviews.Title: Sound / BLAHHHhhh - Picture / YES!
Reviews.Author: Cory j Thoemke "C. Thoemke"
Reviews.Content: Wow, People are right about the sound. YIKES. I happened to have nice computer speakers that i hooked up to it via the mini plug. It sounds like they took some old speakers out of some computers form the 90s. The picture quality is great for a TV in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: dixaloo
Reviews.Content: It's great! No problems with the sound at all. If you have a noisy house or a very large room it might not be adequate, but for a bedroom(even a big one) or apartment it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price - You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Pruitt
Reviews.Content: Ok, first of all, if you are expecting a high end TV, this is NOT for you. But, for the price, I am happy with it. I opened the box, and easily attached the base, which involved inserting 9 screws, all of which were provided, and there was even a little screwdriver. The TV looks great on the stand, but up close you can definately see that the labels are not applied with precision, and the bezel (front cover plate/rim) is rather cheap looking from the back. I plugged this in last night and connected my Samsung smart DVD player to watch Netflix, and I was happy with the performance. The speakers were ok, although this is in a bedroom, so maybe in a large room there would be an issue. The picture was just fine, in my opinion, and the remote worked like it was supposed to. All told, I am happy with this TV, and for my cyber monday price of $119, there is NO way that this is a bad deal. Even at the $169 price, this seems like a good option for someone on a budget, or for a kids room/guest room. I am interested in the companies level of support, with them being fairly new. Hopefully I won't have to find out for a long time.

Reviews.Title: ocosmo 32 " tv
Reviews.Author: matthew krase
Reviews.Content: Was not sure about this purchase but love it ,great product , pat myself on the back for this one...mk

Reviews.Title: very dark and grainy, horrible sound
Reviews.Author: Kim Dulaney
Reviews.Content: I got this tv to replace a tube type that finally died. No cable box just analog cable tv out of the wall. When I plugged it in the first thing I noticed was it was dark and grainy. I Attempted to adjust many ways with the settings. Cool picture, warm picture, dynamic, user etc all didn't work. I thought maybe it might be the fact that it needed a cable box or converter or something. I went and got my sons tv (another 32" flatscreen made by insigna and it had a beautiful picture. This tv was either defective or just very poor quality. The sound is HORRIBLE too. Be smart and read other reviews about the sound. I thought sound was no big deal but I was wrong. It sounds like you are listening to an am pocket radio. I returned it back to amazon after 1 day.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: shelly burkhead
Reviews.Content: Nice, it's good for bed rooms, for gaming, picture is good ,sound u can adjust it so best fits u. Roku ready. good price for ,what u pay for .I enjoy it awesome bright pic in the dark watching a movie .

Reviews.Title: I read the reviews and after my purchase  i found out for myself that it was a good buy the sound is not perfect but good enough
Reviews.Author: Ernie Moreau
Reviews.Content: Ernie  Moreau: very good product compared to similar sizes and brand i read the reviews and after my purchase i found out myself that it was a good buy the sound is not perfect but it is good enough got it a week now in trinidad no regrets

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: warsha2
Reviews.Content: Bought this Cyber Monday for $119.00. I had no problems with sound, if you don't  like "standard" press the sound button on remote and change it to a different setting. I changed it to "soft" because I don't like any television turned up loud. Am so pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Gregory C. Piper "Chair Man"
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my sisters bedroom TV and had shipped directly to her. She is very happy, says the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: tedpierce
Reviews.Content: Shipping time was great. T V worked for 2 weeks and now it does not work and I can not get it serviced, as I have been trying for 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Peter Falk
Reviews.Content: I read every review listed here about this product, and even a few elsewhere, before deciding to purchase this tv for a bedroom. I was especially concerned about the negative reviews about the sound. I am pleased to report that both the sound and the picture are great and I am thrilled with the product! Combined with the great cyber-monday price, quick shipping, and easy set-up, I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a great tv for a bedroom or other smaller room.

Reviews.Title: Sound Solution and Universal Remote Codes for this model
Reviews.Author: MW
Reviews.Content: This has a nice picture as others have already stated.  We wanted this to use with a game console for the kids.  It is working out quite nicely for that purpose.Sound:  The small speakers on this are not great as you have read about in the other reviews.  There is an easy and cheap fix for this though.  You can get out that set of computer speakers you are no longer using (if you have a spare set), or buy a low cost set with a sub-woofer for even better sound.  You simply plug these into the headset jack of the TV for better sound.  Here is a set that gets some bass and volume for a low price.  Cyber Acoustics Subwoofer Satellite System (CA-3602a)Universal Remote Codes:  I wanted to set this up with the remote built into my cell phone, but you will not find this brand in any remote code list I have seen.  Then I found out it uses Sony codes.  I have tested it and can operate channel, sound, inputs, etc.We were able to get this on cyber Monday for $119, so I really can't complain too much about it.  After adding some speakers, it really is a nice setup for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Looks cheap in some details but works great
Reviews.Author: Ma
Reviews.Content: Really nice picture. I just bought it two days ago and it works perfectly, although I~ve never heard about this brand.I was expecting some cheap parts as we can notice the plastic (base) or remote. But nothing really important.If you have at least some pc speakers, it would help once it has phone outlets.I paid 120$ and happy for it. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought this on Cyber Monday for the $119 price - couldn't be happier.  Ordered on Monday, arrived on Tuesday.  My only disappointment with shipping is that it ships in the original box, so if your packages from UPS are normally left in view of anyone or the street, beware.  I was fortunately home when this was delivered so it wasn't an issue for me.I was looking for a 32" TV for our master bedroom, and wanted either a Smart TV or Roku Ready TV and was delighted to find this.  It is light, has great picture quality (using my OTA antenna for HD channels), sound is great (not sure what others are complaining about - I had this set to a volume level of 1 and found it more than adequate, and my bed is across the room from the TV).  Setup was a breeze and the TV menu is intuitive to use.I have a Roku Streaming Stick on the way, so I'll update once I've had a chance to play with that.

Reviews.Title: Best Television
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This is the best television we have ever had. Beautiful picture! Up to date technology! Energy efficient with great sound.

Reviews.Title: Cannot pair with cable or satellite remote.
Reviews.Author: Carey Ingoglia
Reviews.Content: This tv was a great price and almost identical to the sony one. I took off 1 star because the brand is not listed for when u try to pair your cable or satellite tv remote with it. You have to use the tv remote to turn off and on or volume up and down.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't know how the TV worked, I never got it.
Reviews.Author: Dannyboy
Reviews.Content: Ordered more than a week before Christmas, with my Prime account, but the product never arrived. I had to give my son all of the peripherals for a TV and a printed photo of a television. :(  The Amazon representative refunded the money but I had to wait til after Christmas to go out and fight the crowds and buy a TV at Best Buy, as this one never left the shipping facility in Texas. The Amazon rep was nice but did little to resolve the issue other than refund the money, which didn't solve the problem.

Reviews.Title: WARNING: DO NOT BUY!!!! JUNK!!! WASTE OF MONEY
Reviews.Author: RainCityCoug
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV last month as a bedroom TV. I saw the great price and decent reviews online and decided to take a risk and purchase a TV that had mixed reviews... Boy do I regret it.It wasn't a few days before this TV had dead pixels forming before my eyes as I proceeded to tell myself it was a quality TV for the price. Next, the HDMI port proceeded to fail and cause the screen to be fuzzy, having to play around with the cord to get the picture back again. THIS TV IS LOW QUALITY. Sure, I expected sub-perfect quality, but I didn't expect a TV that is just absolutely un-watchable.Returning the TV was a nightmare and I don't wish it upon my worst enemy! I wish I would have just purchased a quality TV to begin with.After dealing with the return, I purchased a MUCH better TV for only $25 more. Trust me, $25 extra is worth the better quality TV and not having to deal with a bad quality TV and returning that bad TV.If you want a QUALITY 32 inch TV, check this one out -----> http://amzn.to/1gYLcMs, it is here on Amazon. I currently own it now and have never been HAPPIER! It has a great quality picture and wasn't insanely expensive like some of the other TV's for sale here. Please, save yourself the time and frustration that I put myself through!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: venita morgan
Reviews.Content: this is the best tv I have in my house and I have 7 so I know this one has the best picture of them all I would recommend it to anyone for there bedroom or smaller room  thanks

Reviews.Title: Great TV and a great deal!
Reviews.Author: K. Marston
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV with an excellent picture.  It has lots of plugs in the back to accommodate all your stuff - we've got an XBox and Google Chrome on it - both work great.  The only drawback is the sound - but, I already had external speakers that I was planning to use, so it didn't bother me.  Overall, this is a great deal - very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Katrinka Solomon
Reviews.Content: So this cost me around $100, cant remember exactly.  Sound is not good but if you invest in some speakers/sound bar youll have no issues.  It actually has a nice picture.  I bought it for my mom who is older and isnt picky, I was tired of looking at her 24 inch plat screen that you cant see! lol

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ML"
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price! Great picture quality. Only issue I have is the remote must have a weak transmitter because you have to point it directly at the tv and sometimes you have to move closer. Overall good value.

Reviews.Title: Ok television for the price
Reviews.Author: Craig Jensen
Reviews.Content: Considering the price I paid for this television (under $200 inc. tax), there is very little room to complain.  My only criticism of this product is the sound quality which is seriously lacking.  For a secondary television or if you are on a tight budget, I would still recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: alex2dog
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv on Cyber Monday for $119 and was a little hesitant since it was only a 720p and the refresh rate was 60Hz. However, I decided to buy it since it was a LED HDTV and I tell you I made the right decision.The picture is awesome with a lot of clarity and vivid color.  I thought the sound was pretty good too.I never heard of this brand before but I would purchase again.There is one con, the base is not a swivel.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: william wilson
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried about this TV as it did have some pretty bad reviews, but it turned out to be a great TV once I adjusted the sound and picture to suit my style, and the price was awesome!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Trudy Kiers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on 12/2/13. Seemed fine at first. Now there is a line across the screen. I sure wish I had purchased a warranty on it. Thought it would last longer than 6 months. It was part of a lightning deal and I didn't see a warranty offered.105-2463139-2529833

Reviews.Title: very light
Reviews.Author: trucker
Reviews.Content: nice tv, nice picture...very light weight which is good since I hung it on the wall.  not a bad tv at all

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: William Derbyshire "bderb"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these as the price was so good. One is now in our bedroom, one in my wifes art studio. set up was very easy especially using HDMI to connect to our Dish receiver. Sound is not really an issue for us, the studio goes into a pioneer surround system and the sound from the TV itself is quite adjustable for our use in the bedroom. Very pleased with our purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my brother for Xmas and so far has been nothing but great!  Has no complaints about the tv, and he can be very picky.  I think the tv has good color and good sound.  I think its on par with bigger name brand tvs on the market.

Reviews.Title: Very wary when I bought this TV but my kid loves it
Reviews.Author: Jeremy A. Hitchcock
Reviews.Content: I bought this when it was on sale for 129 at Christmas time.  I have now had it for 4 months and its still running like a champ.  Great picture.  Only little complaint is it's not too loud.  The speakers could be better.  But if you use this TV for a bedroom TV it works perfect

Reviews.Title: Good "extra" TV- but bad sound.
Reviews.Author: Michele Swindell
Reviews.Content: Good TV for an extra video game only screen. The picture is decent- can't beat the price- but the sound is HORRIBLE.

Reviews.Title: Horrible! Lasted 4 months & went black...dead!
Reviews.Author: D. M. Davis "Poobehr1"
Reviews.Content: I have shopped on amazon for many years & have never given 1 star until now...Santa gave this tv to my 9yr old son for Xmas...figure good cheap tv for a 9 yr old....well didn't expect it to die in April & not returnable or exchangeable ....really...it lasted 4 months & wasn't used very much.  Do not buy this product...extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Works great but terrible sound, worse than any flat screen.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was a little uneasy about ordering a no name brand tv but gave it a shot. The one that was sent was a total dud and did not work at all! After troubleshooting with the Ocosmo support, we ended up having to send it back. They had a new one delivered super fast, like the next day and it works great! Looks great, great picture quality but the sound is terrible! I knew that sound is usually pretty poor coming from a flat screen tv but this is ridiculously poor. The volume sounds about the same when it is on level 20 as it does when it is on 100! We bought a sound bar and now it's perfect, however, for some reason we cannot program our remotes together so it requires several (tv, cable, roku, and sound bar) Our family room is now named "Remote control Hell" but I love the tv!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding for the price
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Really can't believe a TV this amazing only cost $125. I just wanted a crappy bedroom TV, and figured I'd get what I paid for, but it's really no different from any other average TV, good picture, good sound as long as you're not trying to fill a huge living room with sound (in which case why would you have bought this?). Lots of inputs, good OSD, has a USB port so a Chromecast doesn't need an external power supply.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: J. Steward "Jim Steward"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV for price but it is a great deal for the price. I would recommend it to friends

Reviews.Title: good, solid TV
Reviews.Author: DarrenR13
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something a little more "fancy," but couldn't beat the price on this. Prefect size for the bedroom, and other reviews have complained about the sound but it's been great for me. Even at only 720p the picture is very good. Not a bad remote either. Have had it for about four months now and no issues with anything. So far it's been just as good as any more expensive name brand TV. Definitely can recommend, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: perfect for me
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: awesome tv i love it. dont be discouraged by other reviewers they must be rich, this tv is awesome and sleek great for gaming and hd tv. only thing i didnt like as much was the placement of ports but not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 32-inch 720p 60Hz HDTV (Glossy Black)
Reviews.Author: roberta claxton
Reviews.Content: i choose this rating because the tv does not show a clear picture. it is fuzzy. the volume goes up an down. it isnt worth my money i spent for it. i would never reckamend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: wanda tefft
Reviews.Content: can not beat the price. its my everyday computer/ tv and after 4 months im still loving it!!!! great buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture better price
Reviews.Author: bertoj2000 "robert"
Reviews.Content: Purchased his tv based on the reviews and the price. I could not be happier. This tv was a snap to setup, has a great picture and for $160 you can't beat the value

Reviews.Title: Price Quality
Reviews.Author: michael gonzales
Reviews.Content: Just love the stunning picture for this no brand tv that will be known if they keep up the good work. Use it for sat. and computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Get over the Sound is great!
Reviews.Author: Yellow
Reviews.Content: Little tinny in the sound but its for my kids play room and its working great. slung a roku off it and he can get all his cartoons no issues!

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Susan Heath
Reviews.Content: I returned this item.  The picture was very low quality so I purchased a Philips instead and now I'm just trying to

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Denyse
Reviews.Content: GREAT QUALITY for a GREAT Value. This TV is awesome and the picture is so crisp. Delivers quickly, right to your door!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: J. Kreisel
Reviews.Content: We got this around Xmas and it is great for are kids room.  It is very light and was easy to mount.  Good picture and sound kids love it.

Reviews.Title: what a buy!
Reviews.Author: salli j. nichols
Reviews.Content: Picked it up as a quick holiday present for my son. He was thrilled! Great picture and he says the sound is just perfect for his apartment. What a find it was!

Reviews.Title: Nice PICTURE
Reviews.Author: karen osburn
Reviews.Content: The oCOSMO 32 inch tv has a great picture and was easy to hook up.  I have not yet hooked up my new blue ray dvd player but from what I have used the tv for it has been worth the money

Reviews.Title: I Can See Clearer Now!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Ellison
Reviews.Content: Love my flat screen tv...everything is so clear! also very easy to connect to all my gadgets. Thanks oCOSMO love my 32 inch

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the price
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: Product had great picture res for 720p. Assembly was quick but box was missing screws for stand. I would recommend this because of the easy setup and value for overall price. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Best Value!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: This TV is seriously every bit as good as another one we have that was 3 x the cost. If TVs didn't get dated every few years I'd be tempted to stock up on this one - it's great. No volume problems here, either. We do use it on our bedroom - but it's really loud at full volume.

Reviews.Title: Works fine.
Reviews.Author: Harry "abidehandy"
Reviews.Content: It does not work well with regular cable, but in HD it is fine. Got it for my mother who is not very tech saavy, She is up in age, and she is enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent tv
Reviews.Author: Pedro Faria
Reviews.Content: This Tv is great and is better than i suposed it was going to be. I love it to much

Reviews.Title: Fine for a second TV
Reviews.Author: Brian J. Gaietto
Reviews.Content: We needed a second TV for one of our spare rooms that doesn't get used much. For the price, it's not a bad value. It has a nice assortment of connections in the back. My biggest complaints are that the screen colors seem to be off to me, and the remote control range is a little too short. I usually have to get off my my couch to change channels.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our room and its perfect. Great color and sound quality. We were hesitant at first to buy it (you get what you pay for) but this TV was worth the money and you get way more than you pay for. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Ellen "Ellen"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for $159, just after Christmas.  The picture and sound are great.  Set up in 5 minutes. Super light. Using an HMDI cable to my laptop and hooked up to DishTV. Lots of hook ups on the back.  Mostly I use it as a monitor (huge) or to watch Netflix.  I have not had any problems with the sound or the picture.  I do hit the source button without realizing it.  It is now March and still going strong.  I bought the extra warranty just in case. I think it looks great, just a black frame with the name at the bottom (less than 2 inches).
