This is better than expected for the price. I tried speakers but I like the TV sound better. Lots of settings for sound and picture. Enjoy! I am.:)

Reviews.Title: great television
Reviews.Author: T. Rock
Reviews.Content: for the price I paid for this TV I can honestly say I have nothing to complain about. This was bought for my daughter's room she is pleased I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: LosPinas
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I need it to do.  Has a great picture, pretty good sound, and enough HDMI, RCA, USB ports to do everything I need to do.  Im really glad I got this black friday grab!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Lennie J.
Reviews.Content: The TV was priced right and I'm fine with the quality of the picture.  It fits very nicely on the small stand I purchased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bethany D jarrett
Reviews.Content: I got  this on sale around Christmas for the sale price of $179. I could not be happier with it. Great color, and sound. I also use my new Chromecast on this TV and stream Netflix and youtube. Works wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: cgt212
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a 720p 32" LCD that was about 6-7 years old.  The oCOSMO is very nice and sleek, has a nice picture and was a perfect replacement for the outgoing TV.  The sound is not great, but it is just fine for what it is needed for.  If you need a secondary TV, this is an excellent option.You may need to google for the correct code for a universal remote code.  I got lucky and found a post that for DirecTV you just had to use the sony TV code.  Everything worked just fine after that.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price.
Reviews.Author: M. L. Faul "M. L. Faul"
Reviews.Content: This tv is a really great bargain.  The picture is surprisingly good, especially HD channels.  The sound is good enough, but at this price you really can't expect Bose speakers.  The tv was purchased for my son's bedroom, and is the perfect size.  It's mainly used for gaming and watching dvd's, but the picture is really good enough for whatever you need a tv for. Smart buy.

Reviews.Title: Picture good, sound not
Reviews.Author: Amy L. Poole "seasidediva"
Reviews.Content: This tv was a fabulous deal before Christmas and I purchased it for the kitchen, sothe sound was not a huge issue for me, but I do not recommend it for a great dealof movie watching.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a small tv and this fit the bill. It was easy to set up and very simple to use. The color and picture was great. It was a great value for the price. We are very happy

Reviews.Title: 32 inch oCOSMO hdtv
Reviews.Author: dave w
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived promptly It works great. I've read that there is volume problems. I found that the sound problems are probable alternate tuners [satelite receiver] as the over the air sound is great.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars for value- good product
Reviews.Author: Wayne Conley
Reviews.Content: Saw this on sale for $180 and was on the fence about getting it. After all I didn't really need it, and had never heard of the brand,but wound up getting it anyway because of the price and reviews. Don't be too leary because of the new brand name though, as this tv is performing excellently for me. I was worried that this would have a cheap panel installed in it. It has a great picture though, and the viewing angle is awesome and very good wherever in the room you choose to sit. Some complained about the sound as well, but I found it to be quite adequate for a smaller room. Of course if you want GREAT sound you will not get it in a flat panel hd tv, and you should order acessories for sound, but I found it to be ok for my needs. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase. This tv is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: Diane M.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband and he loves it.  Great picture and sound.  Tempted to buy another one!  Can't go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Franchieska
Reviews.Content: Its perfect i love it, is everything i want. Is everything the sellers said, my daugther love it. And the image is perfect

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: John Preston
Reviews.Content: I also signed up for a credit card and applied the $50 credit to the Tv. I ended up with a new 36" TV for only $129.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: pleasestay3107
Reviews.Content: Very clear, picture is wonderful.  It does not have wifi ability but we bought a Roku and even with that expense, the TV was a bargain.

Reviews.Title: beautiful piece of furniture
Reviews.Author: dognaper
Reviews.Content: Beautiful piece of furniture.  HD is awesome.  Makes picture come alive.  Excellent for the price.Will look for this brand for cost and and quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews on TVs before I purchased this one. I did not want to spend a lot of money and felt like I was getting a good deal with this. I have NO PROBLEMS with anything, even the sound. I saw several complaints about the sound quality and I think it is great. Easy to set up, had it working in under 10 minutes (including mounting to the stand.)I would buy this again!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for quest room.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive 32" flat screen for the guest room. Great picture and sound. Not fancy, but a perfect price for the TV.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: Great TV for a bedroom. Nice picture, easy setup. I've had no problems with this TV. Sound isn't great but I never really turn it up too loud anyway as it's in a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Pamela Fisher
Reviews.Content: very nice for the price.  great picture, light weight and I am happy for this purchase.  will definitely buy another one

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: working mom
Reviews.Content: This product came within 2 days.I was very pleased with the t.v.. Excellent picture and extremely nice looking. Easy set up.For the price you can't beat it. Would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Great less expensive flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: Bette J Spurling
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great bargain for the money. It is not a well known name brand, (actually never heard of it) but it stands up to all of them. It has a great picture, sound and all the other qualities of a more expensive set. I am happy with my choice and look forward to many hours of enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 16 year old and he absolutely loves it!  Easy set up and fit well on his entertainment stand!  Great buy over all!

Reviews.Title: Dead pixel on arrival. Remote control SUCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Danial E Bennett
Reviews.Content: Could have bothered with a return but its a cheap tv....whatever. I bought a Roku streaming stick for this thing to eliminate the need for more than one remote.....well the remote is extremely poor that comes with this TV. You literally have to aim in very precisely.....

Reviews.Title: The video in plug did not work
Reviews.Author: Trago Wallace
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV soley for the purpose of playing it with a machine that only had the AV plugs (red, white, and yellow).  But the tv did not recognize that there was something plugged into the yellow video.  It just kept saying "no signal".  So I returned it.

Reviews.Title: very good for the money
Reviews.Author: erica newsome
Reviews.Content: This TV is very very good for the price!  Picture is nice and the sound is ok,  just needed to adjust settings but overall it is a great TV!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jason G. Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this for my best friend, whose tv broke.  She had a small budget, and this tv was perfect.  Easy to setup and picture is great.  It will be 99% cable tv with the occasional DVD! and she could not tell the difference between 720 and 1080 anyway.  Perfect for a cable tv monitor

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: dadonme
Reviews.Content: this item was better than I thought and my son loves it he is quiet happy with it and please

Reviews.Title: Good TV for price
Reviews.Author: guru
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the office break room and we have no issues to speak of. Not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: One tv did not receive single from remote
Reviews.Author: John Tester
Reviews.Content: I'm remodeling my Bar and didn't hang the tv's until Feb 13 th . Not happy with the policy that I can't exchange it.

Reviews.Title: pretty decent
Reviews.Author: Marvin adams
Reviews.Content: not bad for the price i got it at..didnt really know what to expect because i have never heard of this brand but i took a risk and i just love it.

Reviews.Title: great little tv
Reviews.Author: Kyle Anthony Davis
Reviews.Content: would buy another if needed works great and is worth the cost is very useful and happy to have it

Reviews.Title: Great for the Money
Reviews.Author: Alysyn
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my 16 year old son and he loved it!  It was perfect for his bedroom. I was worried after I read all the other reviews but I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great Tv
Reviews.Author: Appleblossom27
Reviews.Content: It's a great tv. Swivels side to side good quality pic when adjusted right, right size for a smaller room. Does need a better sound however, but it's not horrible ( just have to turn up for shows or movies when people talk lower). If you have hearing disabilities or like louder tv get a sound bar or turn up the volume on your hearing aide ;).. Had to return the 1st tv as we think it got damage in route :(. Tried to call the manufacture given that would be the sound thing to do.. Never got a call back and called 2x! Finally just let Amazon know and as always they took care of it with no problem. You can always count on Amazon to take care of any order issue! Also told them about the horrible delivery service with FEDEX (do not like that company, almost as bad as DHL). The delivery is a whole other story, but lets just say I am not done with them, ha ha! I do know I paid way less then the price now which was awesome. As soon as it comes down again I may buy one for me and my bedroom :) since the 1st one was a gift for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Good value, remote did not work
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good value for the price.  We use it as a monitor for our laptop.  The remote did not work and had to return it to oCosmo.  Waiting for a repalcement.

Reviews.Title: great buy - no problems at all
Reviews.Author: nleggett1
Reviews.Content: love the pic - no problems w/sound as some reviews are - great price - can't complain - great deal

Reviews.Title: Happy Happy
Reviews.Author: george ridley
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a great tv...the speakers are a little soft and not balanced. The picture is GREAT!  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: 2 Happy Kids
Reviews.Author: Ronald Stevenson
Reviews.Content: Got each of my children this LED HDTV for Christmas, they both love their new tv's, now if I can only get them out of their rooms.  Very pleased with this purchase in fact I am going to another one for my workout room.

Reviews.Title: Product arrived with pieces chipped off
Reviews.Author: Dfras
Reviews.Content: The tv had pieces from the bracket chipped off and broke when it arrived.  It has 3 HDMI inputs but only two of mine work.  Because I am using this TV for a spare bedroom, it would have been more of a hassle for me to carry this to a local fed ex to return the shipment.  At the price I paid I won't care if this TV isn't in top shape because it will only get occasional use.  What I did like was that there is a support line offered for the first month you have the TV, they were very helpful in fixing the HDMI problem.  At first two were not working and we were able to get it so that only 1 wasn't.  The picture quality is good.  The remote sticks a bit, but you could always use a replacement remote.  I know some people mentioned the sound wasn't loud.  It seems fine to me.Would buy again if I need a cheap TV.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price.
Reviews.Author: T. Williams
Reviews.Content: I just purchased one of these as a bedroom TV, mounted on a wall mount with Apple TV, and Panasonic Blue Ray hooked up.First what it is not, or does not have:- Not a smart TV.  No big deal, I have an Apple TV hooked up to it anyway.- Not loaded with options, but at the price what do you expect.- loaded with adjustment options.  My Samsung has more options for picture and sound.What it is, or what it does have- Attractive- EXCELLENT picture.  I mentioned above it doesn't have as many adjustment options as my Samsung, but I think the picture on this @ 720p may actually be better than my 50" @ 1080p- Adequate sound. No flat screen with small speakers that are down firing are going to sound awesome, but while watching it, you don't notice it one way or the other.  If it's a problem, buy a sound bar.  Not a necessity though.- MHL ready.  Although I'm not currently using it, this is a cool feature.  If you have a smart phone with unlimited data, you can use your phone to act as a set top box (ie Roku, Apple TV, etc).  I may try the Roku stick in the future.I am very pleased with this set so far.  I can certainly see why this is one of the fastest growing TV brands in the US.Great picture, Great price, Great deal.  Buy one, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Reggie Owens
Reviews.Content: I saw this online and wanted for my mother's bedroom. It fits perfectly and very good picture quality. She really loves it.

Reviews.Title: The best 200.00 bucks I've ever spent!
Reviews.Author: Lisa W. Moore
Reviews.Content: I love amazon! This TV is excellent, I'd read reviews of other buyers complaining about the sound quality. I have nothing but positive feedback about this TV! I have and will recommend this TV to anyone shopping for a flat screen. Installation was a snap, taking it pout of the box was the most difficult part! Also, I received the TV a lot sooner than promised. I also purchased a wall mount bracket, I installed it, now we have a great TV on the wall. My wife and I love this Tv!!

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with it!
Reviews.Author: Curtis H. Folts
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV I've owned since 2003.  I have fallen off the learning curve where TV's are concerned!  This one has been relatively easy to learn though, and I am totally happy with the quality of picture and the collection of features.  I cannot compare it to other flat screen TV's as I have never owned another one.  But I do like this one.  So, at least from a beginner's point of view, it's fine.

Reviews.Title: cosmo television
Reviews.Author: alan s.
Reviews.Content: Quality of picture, sound the price a triple winner, you don't always find all three values in all products a great deal with this television.

Reviews.Title: This TV is worth the money
Reviews.Author: lender
Reviews.Content: I bought to TVs and I am satisfy with the buy. I little problem with the remote but I use the cable remote and the TVs work very good. It was a very smart buy.

Reviews.Title: Cosmo 32 inch TV Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 20 something son. He plays video games on it and uses it to watch tv and movies. The picture is much brighter and crisper than our 5 yr old 32 inch LG LCD flat screen. The sound is good too! This tv is very good value for the money for sure.

Reviews.Title: 32" led
Reviews.Author: Bill P.
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a really nice TV great picture.  My mom uses it everyday all day long so far so good.

Reviews.Title: We enjoy our t.v
Reviews.Author: keta garza
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my boyfriend for xmas nd he luvs it. D pic is good he luvs how it rotates even wthout a wall mount or stand lol he likes he culd cnnct hs fone to d t.v. We like it its a good quality nd it wasn't even tht xpnsive :-D

Reviews.Title: W hat a great deal!!
Reviews.Author: Durr D. Dawg "X"
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as expected.. No box damage.. Delivered quickly.. Looks fantastic..e asy set-up (don't dish out extra cash for installation unless your one off those who could never figure out how to set the clock on your VCR) because this is a breeze to install.  I expect many years of use from this apliance and the extended warranty (3 years) was very affordable.. Would argue with anyone who claims this isn't a great deal.. If it doesn't work then request a replacement, that simple.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Isaac Ortega
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture!! LOVE IT!!! Great sound I have my PS4 connected to it and it's freaking exhilarating...watched the Super Bowl very comfortable in my room.

Reviews.Title: My.T.V
Reviews.Author: Heather Kaleiohi
Reviews.Content: Well I love the colors and the clarity of the t.v just wish the speakers were in the front of the t.v overall its a very nice t.v n I love it a lot. ...

Reviews.Title: great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: purchased 2 of them for my sons rooms and they are great. for the price of them they are better then what I expected them to be. My sons love them. they sound good picture is good and overall quality is good. recommend them for kids rooms or for extra tv.

Reviews.Title: nice!
Reviews.Author: M.A.
Reviews.Content: Looks good, but sound is thin, i think. The remote is lightweight but very good design. Am thrilled with the ROKU, and pleased with the extra-hi number of ports ... I'm connected to ROKU, cable box, DVD player, and (being an antique myself) a VCR player .... still are some empty holes back there. ........ may have to splurge for a sound bar or something, however.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jonvieve
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my kids as a safety measure since we had a huge tube tv in their room. With the slimness/lightweight form of the tv it fit great on there book shelf. I don't know if it's the fact that is a smaller screen but it's almost better than our Philips which is a 40. I would defiantly recommend this for anyone not just kids. The picture quality is amazing for just a great priced flat screen.  My only complaint is that the USB is a little picky, and I can't access the files we have for movies etc. I might just play with it a bit

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: steven barnhouse
Reviews.Content: the first tv i got was defective  i called amazon and  a replacement was sent out same day with 2 day shipping  free of charge  and i was giveing 30 days to return the defective tv  so  5 stars also for amazons customer support  the tv on the other hand is great  has a amazing picture  works great  but from the 2 different tvs i got  there was different layouts  for the outputs and jacks  not at all a bad thing  just the back of your tv may or may not look like the one pictured

Reviews.Title: A Gift For My Mother
Reviews.Author: YvonneInKY
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my mother who insisted she did NOT want a HDTV because there was nothing wrong with the old one sitting on a beautiful cabinet in her living room, hiding one of the most beautiful pieces of furniture she owns.  Apart from being at my home when the TV was delivered, it was a total surprise.  LOLShe insisted she was not going to accept this so there was no sense in taking it to her house on Christmas Eve; it was going straight back home with me.  Two days later she was still fussing about how she did not need a new TV.  And then her brother showed up and put the stand on it and screwed the cable line into the TV.Needless to say, she was amazed at the difference.  Ask her now if she would like to return the television.  You will hear nothing except, "No, no, no!"  Despite having to listen to her fussing for nearly a month, it was worth every minute of aggravation and I would go through each and every minute ten times over to see her so excited about a gift.(Oh, & it works perfectly.  I would definitely buy another.  Arrived ahead of schedule and have not had any problems - to date.)

Reviews.Title: Poor Sound and only one media outlet
Reviews.Author: Social Butterfly
Reviews.Content: This tv has terrible sound quality - it's super loud at the low levels but never really gets "loud" when you turn it up so you can hear over background noise.  It also only has one spot to plug in media so I have to change cords every time I want to use my DVD player or Wii.  I would not purchase this particular model again.

Reviews.Title: Loveing it.
Reviews.Author: Ultramuerto
Reviews.Content: This Led TV turned to be better than what I expected for the price. Its light weighted, nice HD image, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: James Hoye
Reviews.Content: works well , hanging on wall ,  looks great use as TV  and with playstation  already told others , only had for 2 months we'll see how long it last

Reviews.Title: Good TV as far as we know
Reviews.Author: Shells
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas.  Since she doesn't live here, we don't know how it's performing, but she hasn't said anything about it NOT being a good TV, so I can only assume it is.

Reviews.Title: was great at first
Reviews.Author: MndBodSl1
Reviews.Content: Its not working correctly any more....... I pushed a button probably on the remote and can not get it back to normal no matter what I do

Reviews.Title: 32 flatscreen
Reviews.Author: kendra marr
Reviews.Content: Good tv for the price.  Doesn't seem really durable.  Not great sound for listening to music.  Great picture!  Good so far

Reviews.Title: Sound qualty leaves you wanting
Reviews.Author: Christine Crompton
Reviews.Content: The picture is nice but the speakers are on the back of the tv so the sound qualty is diminished.

Reviews.Title: Nice, inexpensive TV
Reviews.Author: Naomi Ramage
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my family over Christmas break while I was visiting them. Got it within five days, with Amazon Prime. It was very lightweight and easy to assemble. Perfect for small to medium-sized apartments or condos.

Reviews.Title: Love this television
Reviews.Author: christoph b. gargoline
Reviews.Content: For the price this television offers a very good picture and a good range of functions, including being Roku ready.

Reviews.Title: Great television especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Angelica Salazar
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with this television. I got it for a great price during cyber Monday for my bedroom. The picture and sound quality is fantastic. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a television for a bedroom or guestroom. I chose a five star rating because I have been so happy with this purchase since day one.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal !!!
Reviews.Author: bernice rines
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this purchase. It exceeded my expectations. However, the sound quality when watching blue rays, is difficult to hear at times. I would recommend purchasing an additional sound bar if you plan on watching a lot of movies. Other than that, it has great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Sound may be an issue
Reviews.Author: B Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Everything said of this television is true--it's got a great picture, not  just for the price--but you- may want to use a sound bar because it doesn't reach a very high volume and, on some settings, it's very tinny.  There's nothing wrong with the picture, and assembly was easy.  I am using the stand-alone base, not the wall-mount.

Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: Jthompson
Reviews.Content: Item arrived exactly as described. Shipping was very fast, even though item was ordered during the holidays. It made for a great gift!  The picture on the TV is GREAT!!! The stand was a little difficult, but we eventually got it tight enough to hold the TV properly. Overall, good TV, especially for kid!

Reviews.Title: bad purchase
Reviews.Author: Francisco Valdez
Reviews.Content: the image is bad on all channels. The speakers dont have good sound.very dissapointed with this purchase.thankyou

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: 32" LED for $179, can't beat it for the price.  Great picture, not so great sound.  BUT, you have to take into account the price, and I have a 42" Vizio that has better sound, but not a lot better.  I paid a lot more for the Vizio and intend to install a sound bar for this one to make up for the sound shortfall.  Great connectivity BTW.

Reviews.Title: 32" tv great value excellant picture and sound is not bad at all !
Reviews.Author: brad peterson
Reviews.Content: Great buy excellent picture, sound is great has plenty of plug ins for my kids game systems also my surround sound system

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Sable H. "Sable H."
Reviews.Content: Got this for my sons bedroom to hook to their new Xbox One. No problems at all. The picture is clear. Sound is fine. After some of the reviews about the sound I was worried but I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great for RVs
Reviews.Author: Michael Smith
Reviews.Content: We got this TV to put in out camper trailer. The weight, or lack there of, makes it a far better choice when you have to consider every pound. And with a very reasonable price, should it get damamged while moving, it would be easy to replace. The resolution is good, I love being able to connect it to my computer, and the no signal self-off  means that it wont just sit and eat up juice.

Reviews.Title: Good mostly
Reviews.Author: Amanda Smith
Reviews.Content: It suits my needs for the most part, it's the right size, it's surprisingly light weight and the picture is good. The sound leaves a little bit to be desired, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars. For the price and how often I watch T.V. it's good.

Reviews.Title: Like it!!!
Reviews.Author: Irma
Reviews.Content: Really good price and a really good tv just the ocosmo logo every time I turn it in... But other than great!

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: F Daniel
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great the only problem is the volume clarity is not that good but I'm satisfied especially with the price

Reviews.Title: 32" LED
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my aging father who has a difficult time viewing the computor monitor screen, he's happy with it so I'm giving it 4 stars.  I think if you watch movies on it you may wish to go with 1080p for better picture quality but for a monitor it works great.

Reviews.Title: OK OK I get it.
Reviews.Author: Michael Romeo
Reviews.Content: The reason I rated the TV 3 stars is everytime I turn on the TV the oCosmo logo is displayed on the TV. That is something I have never seen before and didn't expect it this time.

Reviews.Title: Looks good so far
Reviews.Author: HAROLD "FROGGY6916"
Reviews.Content: Great tv at an unbeatable price. Came well packaged, worked great right out of the box and seems sturdy. All in all a great lil tv with great picture.

Reviews.Title: Fair for the Price ($110) during Black Friday.
Reviews.Author: Cristian F.
Reviews.Content: The Pros:Good Image QualityEasy to ProgramGood Distance response for remote controller.The Bad:Sound Quality is not the best, not the worst. If you really like good sound for movies, at least consider a SoundBar.The stand is not so good quality, but if you place the tv in a wall mount you will be ok.My Average: 3.5

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: donna manning
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the clarity and all the features I was skepticak due to the name brand but have been pleasantly surprised

Reviews.Title: Surprised to say - Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Big Dan "-Big Dan in NY"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a dinosaur 25" TV I've had in my bedroom for years. I was really hesitant to buy this TV as I've been burned with cheap flat screens before. A couple years back I bought a cheap 32" from another retailer that burned out within 2 months. I had this TV in my cart for about a month but kept hesitating. Finally, the price dropped to $179 and I said to myself "Amazon's return policy is awesome if there's a problem and if it blows after the 30 day window I can live with eating the $179.:I haven't had this TV *that* long yet but I have faith in it.  It's a great set. I'm constantly blown away by the HD picture quality even when compared to the 32" LCD in my living room.3 HDMI inputs is great for future proofing. Currently, I have my DVR, Roku, and Receiver plugged in via HDMI. I plan to add a BlueRay player into the mix shortly. I'll probably remove my receiver from HDMI as I really don't need it - it's just for the  OSD. All my older video games (PS2, Game Cube, Original Xbox) are hooked up to an RCA switch which plugs into the TV - works flawlessly.There are some negatives though:The sound isn't good at all. It's really evident when you first start using the set but your ears get used to it. Changing the sound to "Dynamic" with the sound button on the remote helps some. However,  I paired the TV with this receiver: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0077V88V8/ and it sounds great! I use the Digital/Optical Audio out from the TV to the receiver. For the most part, I use the TV's speakers at night and the surround sound when I want to immerse myself in a movie.The picture is fantastic overall. I do notice it's hard to see the details on people's faces especially around the eyes in dark scenes. Also in dark scenes people's skin seems to have a yellowish tone to it. I don't know if it's a source issue though - I've only noticed this while streaming so no points deducted there. "Vivid" seems to be the best looking picture option.The remote is a bit flunky. If not pointed directly at the sensor it doesn't pickup even with fresh batteries. However, my cable box's universal remote controls the volume and turns the TV on and off while being pointed pretty much anywhere.One star was taken away due to the quality sound and finicky remote. However this is still a GREAT buy I'm considering purchasing a second one for another bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Good T.V.
Reviews.Author: Edmund La Clair
Reviews.Content: I do not watch T.V. often, but I wanted something reliable and affordable. This set definitely was a worthwhile purchase, it connects to everything from my computer to gaming systems with no trouble. It has simple and easy to use features. Can't ask for much more than that if you want a basic unit to just watch television. The picture is good, and I can't tell a difference between this and more expensive sets of the same size.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Techy35
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of oCOSMO as a brand, however really liked the sticker price.  Packaged well, easy setup, clear picture and very good sound quality from speakers located at the bottom of the TV itself.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: If you have Direct TV, there is no code for this Chinese TV so the on/off and volume control can only be done w/ Ocosmo remote
Reviews.Author: Carol A Smith
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is fine but I have major hand/finger problems and this is a BIG DEAL for ME to have everything done by using only the Direct TV Remote.  In fact, I am going to check into returning this TV tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: C "C"
Reviews.Content: I just got a Roku and this is the only device I needed to watch my Netflix.  It is huge, and has a great quality picture, and not much assembly is needed, although the instructions are a bit confusing at first.  I like that there is an old timey VGA connection so I didn't have to buy an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Couldnt Pass up
Reviews.Author: Brian W Cline
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent and the price is very good  performance  is as good as my Vizio so I say a DEAL!

Reviews.Title: Minor shipping issues solved fast, great TV
Reviews.Author: Kaleb
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it seemed like a steal for the price. When the TV came, it was missing a stand, remote, and power cable, but after I called customer support, they shipped them to me 2 day express! It's a great buy with much better customer support than other manufacturers, would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cosmo TV
Reviews.Author: J. Michael
Reviews.Content: This TV has a excellent picture. Great color. Speakers in TV are very low quality. Volume at max is very low.

Reviews.Title: Best tv
Reviews.Author: Scott T. Piper
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture & size for bedroom that is 12'x10'. Perfect sound quality too. Plenty of connections for external devices( dvd player, gaming system, etc.)

Reviews.Title: Great Watching
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: The TV has great picture and sound.  Everything would have been great except that the hook up wires and cables were not in the box.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: Robert Rice
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great deal and the sound on it is extremely good and excellent picture quality highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Pleased Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: uberdoug
Reviews.Content: The television is mounted in my teenage son's room and is exposed to a lot of moving and adjusting to maneuver the direction of the television to where it is facing depending on where he is in the room.  The television is easy to clean and had been very durable.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great picture.. Sound, not that great..Soundbar improved the sound...
Reviews.Author: Karen "Karen of Northern Michigan"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband for Christmas to replace a smaller TV in the bedroom.. It has a great picture with sharp color and is working fine.. It's light weight, very easy to move around and maneuver. We have dish and had to use the "Sony" code to get the dish remote to work, but once done, it's working fine..The sound seemed fine to me, but my husband is hard of hearing and has ringing of the ears, so the sound wasn't that great for him. We bought an RCA sound bar for $49 at Walmart and it's improved the sound a great deal..Even having to buy the sound bar, the TV was a great deal. I paid $179.99 for the Tv on Amazon, so with the soundbar, it was still under $235 for a great TV. The size is good for a bedroom. Not too big, not too small..

Reviews.Title: Good product for Price. Audio quality can be better
Reviews.Author: Gopinath Palanisamy Sivakumar
Reviews.Content: Everything is Good. Sound can be better. That's the disadvantage. Picture is fine. Integration with Xbox is great.  That's it.

Reviews.Title: Being entertained happily
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: This was also a present for my mother-in-law.  She loves the size and the quality of picture that this TV presents.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tv for a great price; color scheme weird for couple seconds when started.
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Amazing tv for a great price.  Sometimes when I turn the  tv on it has a problem with it's color scheme,  But only for a few seconds while it warms up.  Not enough of a problem to warrant less than five stars though.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: Harvey
Reviews.Content: This set is in a bedroom so only gets viewed at night but so far has preformed perfectly and I would defiantly purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: t.v.
Reviews.Author: John Nelson
Reviews.Content: Great T.V. had it since Christmas and its super clear and light. We like it better than our larger T.V. Good buy :)

Reviews.Title: hi, i enjoy
Reviews.Author: zulay
Reviews.Content: bery well, so, i need this item, i like very much. so, very beautiful y attractive.  i am enjoy for your product

Reviews.Title: very happy with this purchase.
Reviews.Author: CANDICE SCHROEDER
Reviews.Content: received the tv in 2 days. works great. i purchased this tv for my grandson's room. he loves it for his video games. easy set up. great price for a 32-inch tv.

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality but...
Reviews.Author: Kevin Haight
Reviews.Content: As stated, the picture quality is good. However, the sound has some issues. It sounds like it has trouble with low range frequencies. I was watching Dexter on Netflix and every time a low note hits in the soundtrack it gets distorted, like it is over amplified. For the price, including the Square Trade warranty, you can't really beat it.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture!!
Reviews.Author: suzanne i snee
Reviews.Content: Good pic, Price is right, very happy!!Just the right size for the bedroom, Does need both channel changes for cable, But will survivor,  HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY!!

Reviews.Title: I ordered this TV without realizing i did
Reviews.Author: Ken Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: I am a newbie to Amazon so i clicked a button without realizing it was instant order button. I don't need alot in a TV so this one was great for me. Very easy to set-up! Picture is fine for me. The sound is not very good but for now and my budget it will do. I don't think you will find a TV of this quality for the price i paid here! It's a keeper for me!

Reviews.Title: Really like this TV and the deal was great
Reviews.Author: Pao
Reviews.Content: So I bought this for a spare bedroom and I am very impressed. light, easy to install and OH SO CHEAPYou have to be realistic and realize if you want big sound.. buy a better tv or add speakers.

Reviews.Title: Everything it promised!
Reviews.Author: Robert Sayegh
Reviews.Content: All the bells and whistles with good picture quality at very fair price.  I would recommend thisTV to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price, but 1 important suggestion to the buyer and manufacturer.
Reviews.Author: Will Griffing
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV through Amazon and had to return it within the first week.The coaxial cable connection is facing down and it is over the support base. There is barely enough room to connect the coaxial cable in directly and once you do it is very {VERY} easy to break the female receptacle on the TV. I moved the TV to the side and it simple snapped. I would guess that it is spot-welded into place.I've had the 2nd TV for several weeks now and absolutely no complaints with the operation aspect.I have just purchased a F-Type Right Angle Adapter - 90° Female to Male Connector to help alleviate some of the stress when moving or turning the TV. The part shouldn't cost more than a dollar or so, but to the manufacturer (if they choose not to make a design change) they should include the item with the TV. Buying in bulk would cost $0.25-0.50 maximum.I cannot speak for oCOSMO's technical support as I purchase most of my online items via Amazon for the ease of replacement and/or returns.

Reviews.Title: 5 star worthy
Reviews.Author: terri thomas
Reviews.Content: I found it worthy of 5 stars seeming as the price was cheap and it was available at the last minute before Christmas. Plus I've never heard of this brand before.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Sarah Ostrowski
Reviews.Content: The only downside to this product is a tinny sound quality. The picture is amazing, for the size and quality you would have thought I had spent a few hundred dollars more than I did. Love it, bought one as a gift and ended up getting one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Sound not great
Reviews.Author: Marie Oberst
Reviews.Content: we gave this to my mother-in-law. She finds conversations are muffled at times. increasing the volume does not help. The picture is good.

Reviews.Title: good picture !
Reviews.Author: Joseph Raborn III
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating because it's got a good picture and apps !I disliked the sound quality !I would recommend this TV for someone on a tight budget !

Reviews.Title: GOOD!!
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL RAMIREZ E
Reviews.Content: just something great I am very happy with this purchase.! the price is right and the quality is very acceptable tv simply unique.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the bedroom or for gaming.
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: Looks great for gaming or as a bedroom TV. It's extremely light so wall mounting won't be an issure either.

Reviews.Title: It was a great price.
Reviews.Author: Mae Weber
Reviews.Content: The picture is great (most important thing).  The remote is chintzy (but we mostly use our "cable co. remote). The speakers are inadequate and placed facing out the back, I solved this problem by connecting the TV to the receiver for our music system, now we have more sound then we will ever need. It's the family room TV used mostly when using exercise equipment or by the grandchildren so it was a perfect purchase for us.

Reviews.Title: Looks good, only minor issues
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Overall it seems to be okay. The logo/sticker on the front peeled off when I was cleaning the tv, leaving huge ugly scratches on the front, and halve of the logo is gone now. The stand is wobbly, and doesn't use two screws that the instructions said it needed. I am constantly having to even out the tv, it is usually leaning a little toward one side and I have to put papers underneath to stablize it, checking it with a leveler. It's rare that the tv is actually at a 90 degree angle with the surface.Also the internal clock is always off by 10-30 minutes, and the "auto-clock" function is useless; it always sets the time and date to 1/1/2000 with a random time.The headphone jack is all the way in the back, and when playing Xbox 360 through headphones I noticed the sound quality can get bad at certain times. It is similar to a song that is less then 120kbps, I don't know how to describe it but only seems to affect the game's audio, and not the custom soundtracks I always have playing.I've pulled on that headphone jack on accident and that really bothers me, I have an extension cord for my headphones and that's barely enough.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Bob E.
Reviews.Content: This TV has worked very well. The picture and sound are both very good. Not that they were needed but, the number of inputs is very good including an MHL port.  I may have to upgrade to the Roku MHL just to have an even better setup. They only setup issue I had, had to do with the VESA mounts. I was replacing a tv that died and the thread size was different.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Kevin Horeis "EVO 3D guy"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture.  Bought this for my brothers kids to play Xbox on. A month later and still great picture.  Didn't notice any sound issues.

Reviews.Title: got it before xmas.
Reviews.Author: Xiao Hua Li
Reviews.Content: i ordered it for my son in taxes shortly before xmas. was told that it would not be delivered before xmas. but he got it on xmas eve. so it was pretty impressived.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: John Kral
Reviews.Content: What a price and what a deal!!!  Just 720p and picture and features are amazing!  I read that 1080 and 720 show no difference to the human eye and they are right!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gabriel M.
Reviews.Content: The TV is great. Picture is great. This is in my bedroom and works perfectly. The people who say its sound is subpar need to have there hearing checked. I love the fact that it has 3 HDMI ports(1MHL compatible) and a powered usb port. I use this TV for my Raspberry Pi and love it.

Reviews.Title: ocosmo 32 in. tv
Reviews.Author: darrell baker
Reviews.Content: rec. the tv in good shape; hooked it up; works great; no problems. the sound is not a problem some have stated; seems to be fine. color is good. great price; good quality.

Reviews.Title: TV for granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Earl Tibbitts
Reviews.Content: She loves this TV. Perfect compliment to her collection of electronics. Clear, sharp picture, great profile with good sound quality. This TV would satisfy almost anyones taste for a product of this size. I would highly recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Johnny Spicer
Reviews.Content: I found this tremendous value on Prime. It has great sound and picture, works great with our Blu ray player. One added bonus was the Xbox inputs on the side. I searched an could not find a new TV that had the RCA inputs on side, but this Ocosmo had it and it works great. Extremely pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: detra williams
Reviews.Content: The tv is a great deal for the price and my daughters love it great picture quality as well. I will order from this company again

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV for the price
Reviews.Author: N. P. Lizaso "neo666"
Reviews.Content: I've had it just over a month, and so far the tv has exceeded my expections for the price I paid.  Great picture quality and user friendly dialog boxes.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Ray A Antunez
Reviews.Content: Shockingly lightweight, clean clear picture, no speakers that you can see, but it puts out plenty of volume.I may have to get another one if the price hits $110 again, like it did during the holidays.

Reviews.Title: If you're new to HDTV's Read this Info
Reviews.Author: WhiteTigerRevenge
Reviews.Content: Here is the info, Buy This Right Now. This is an excellent TV for the price and since its LED it doesn't hurt your eyes. I got this as a gift for my mom and she is very happy with it. Would recommend this to anyone A++

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Angelyn's kindle
Reviews.Content: I got this for my parents for Christmas. Great price!  Awesome picture! Awesome sound!  Easy to set up.  They loved it.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: gene rockwell
Reviews.Content: As a "deal of the day" price was the first attraction.  Now that I've used it, the value was even more outstanding.  I don't know how you can beat it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 60" TV  for my family for Christmas. Didn't like the reviews on most of them and tthe one i finally chose (sony) was too expensive for now.  So decided to get  a low price set to get by for a year.  Liked the reviews on this oCosmo and the price (179).  Got the oCosma sound bar (59) with it because the sound is not good with all flat screen with reear facing speakers.  Out of the box with no ajustment this TV has an excellent picture.  As good as the sony that i was looking at!  The sound is good with the sound bar.  In the three weeks that we have had it many people have commented on the clear picture and vibrant colors of this set.  Now if only oCosmo will make a 60" I will buy this brand.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: musicgirl
Reviews.Content: I wasn't familiar with this brand, so I was kinda unsure about purchasing this TV, but the price was amazing so I went ahead and purchased this as a Christmas gift.  The TV is great, we are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Esteban Contreras
Reviews.Content: Nice product,works great,good picture easy to use and great price would buy another next time need a tv A++++  TV

Reviews.Title: Better than expected for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ken Birk
Reviews.Content: Never heard of the Cosmo brand, so did not know what to expect. Good picture quality. Sound is OK, but louder in the rear of the TV than in the front, which makes us turn up the sound to higher levels to hear it clearly. Like the swivel base feature. Good quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv and at good price
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: I bought this Tv for my outdoor covered patio.  Since I don't have a cable connection outdoors, I'm using an over the air antenna and my Roku to stream my cable channels through the TWC app.  I didn't expect much out of a cheap tv but I'm more than satisfied with the picture and the sound.  I definitely recommend buying this TV for spare room but probably won't purchase this as a main living room TV where you do most of your TV viewing.

Reviews.Title: What a Deal!
Reviews.Author: B W
Reviews.Content: having never heard of oCosmo TV I was a bit reluctant to purchase but the combination of the great price and some of the best reviews out there for a 32" LED TV I decided to try it.  It was a great decision.  The picture is sharp with very good color and the sound I would rate a good for any 32" flat screen.  There are also options to adjust color and sound to your liking.  It worked perfect for me right out of the box.  The next time I need a TV I will look for this brand.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Clarity, rivals my larger 1080p TVs
Reviews.Author: Sam "Eagle 85"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a bedroom, and it is the perfect size.  There are plenty of HDMI ports and the MHL port works well with an Android device (and I will assume the Roku stick, even though I don't have one for it).  Set-up was easy, and wall mounting was painless.  Speakers are a bit tinny, but very usable after you tweak the EQ settings.  My son is running this TV through a 2.1 stereo at the moment, and it sounds MUCH better with the added benefit of a sub-woofer, even a small one.At first, the TV would not pick up any digital channels, so we took it to another room where we knew that TV had no issues.  This TV picked up all digital channels from that cable port, so we knew it was just a bad cable in that bedroom.  Fixed the splitter issue, and ran new cable... all is well!My son has connected his PC via HDMI, as well as his X-box.  This TV handles gaming from PC or X-box just fine, without flicker or pixel-lag.My only issue with this TV is the remote control... you have to aim DIRECTLY at the receiver on the TV.  My Sceptre TV is the same way, but the other (higher-end) TV's in the house do not have this issue... just aim in the general direction and you're golden.Since this is a new company, I have taken a risk over longevity of the purchase, but hopefully it will be a brand that lasts!

Reviews.Title: Not bad for generic brand !!
Reviews.Author: Adam Courtney
Reviews.Content: Came to my house within three days great picture for a generic brand can't beat the price for a flat panel delivered toy door with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: K. Drane "kDbUg"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture. The remote it came with is a little flimsy (the back doesn't like to stay on) but the tv is great and was easy to put together.

Reviews.Title: Buy at your own risk
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: Gave this TV to our son on December 22nd. On March 26th and the TV powers on,but the screen is black and no sound.Sent to customer service for repair. They received it for repair on April 8th according to UPS.April 14th and no word from them. Will update with results. Even if it comes out ok, I would never buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Bernard D Poblador
Reviews.Content: This is a very good price for a 32" TV. Bought this for a bedroom, and it does the job without any issues. Great picture, even sound contrary to what most people are complaining about. Very slim and light, easy to move around.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed!
Reviews.Author: Robert Boyd "Robert F. Boyd II"
Reviews.Content: This television is quite good considering it is made by an independent company and is not too well known. I give it 4 stars because it has tons of input plugins and high quality components.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: charles horner
Reviews.Content: bought this tv for our guest bedroom, works as good as our own tv in the living room!! thanks Amazon!! great price as well

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Donald F. Kerrigan Jr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these for the bedrooms in my house and so far I'm happy with the tv's. The picture quality is good and the price was great! My only issue is I can not find a code to program my direct tv remotes so you have to use the tv's remote to controll sound and turn on and off.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Valerie Dudek
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas pressy to myself. I have it in my bedroom, I love watching my favouite programs, from the warm comfort of my bed!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture! Tinny sound. Good buy. ...For the right buyer.
Reviews.Author: Alex Avila
Reviews.Content: Great picture, GREAT price, tinny sound. Well worth the purchase price, packaged well, & shipped FedEx. The TV is EXACTLY what I expected: A great buy to the wise consumer.

Reviews.Title: A good LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: VE158424 Victor Aponte
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for just 179$. Considering the price anyone would expect a piece of junk but it really fullfilled my need. I was looking for a well-priced TV for my room, which I could use to watch BR movies, play ps3 or maybe connect to my tablet. This TV was 80$ cheaper than others known brands and had every options found in models that cost 300+. Has MHL port+3 HDMI, so I can connect almost anything to it. Has Roku compatibility and 2x10W speakers (I boosted this with extra speakers). The colors are great. I do not complain, even when there is sunshine in the room.Few details that makes you realize this is not a more expensive brand could be the Remote Control, it is too big and the speakers, as I said beforeIn conclusion, If you wanna save money (here in Venezuela we only get 400$ cheaper than normal dollar price, so we mind about it) and dont have problem with new brands, then this is the tv for you.Another thing, I chose this 720p model because I read there is no noticeable difference with 1080p when the size is under 42", so... This is your model.. :D

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Workin' Mama
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter for Christmas.  It was on a lightning deal and I got it for a great price.  I am very happy that I bought it.  It has a really nice picture and good sound for a child's playroom.  Attaching the base to the TV was a simple, 5 minute procedure .  No complaints, great TV value for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: EVE
Reviews.Content: grad this great deal very very nice price and beatiful tv I  plan to buy 1 more for a 2 room

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids play room at cheap price.
Reviews.Author: Dori Weaver
Reviews.Content: Perfect for kids play room at cheap price.Has 3 HDMI ports vs 2 on the comparable 32 inch Samsung.

Reviews.Title: O.h C.ome O.n S.top M.oping O.verit
Reviews.Author: Trell
Reviews.Content: I ordered the 1080p version but im reviewing this one since i cant find the 1080p 32 inch version on amazon as of this moment. I guess that one was the most sought after. Who is to blame? The 1080p 32 inch was the same price as what the 720p is going for now. Im giving it 4 stars because when i ordered mine off of amazon the order somehow never got shipped on its delivery date even though my payment was taken as if the order had been shipped. Thnx to amazons friendly customer service i got it shipped a.s.a.p. after waiting two additional days of its expected delivery date. I was upgrading from my 19 inch and i searched amazon high and low and this seemed to be the best deal for a 1080p t.v. Unlike many online shoppers i actually look at the negative comments before purchasing an item. Thats why im never a bitter shopper. I know what im getting. I havent used all the features on this t.v. but i like how it had 3 hdmi ports. I mainly use this for gaming and i have multiple consoles. I like how i can channel from each hdmi port on the fly just by the remote. It makes it much easier to switch from my 360 to my ps3 and ps4 and etc because i use and hdmi cord for all of them. The sound is bad but i knew that before i bought it but i dont use this for watching cable so its ok. This is such a huge upgrade for me so no complaints here. The HD is really crisp and clear. Its too bad most of my games are 720p. I like how the tv turns itself off when its not been used in awhile. The remote is cheaply made and it is a pain to turn channels with it but luckily these tvs can move at a slight angle from left to right which is nice. I like how it came with a screw driver and screws to put the base on. The set up was pretty easy. One thing i did struggle with were the ports on the back. They have them at an angle to where u might have to lay the t.v. flat just to plug anything into them. That part was a pain. The size of the t.v. is decent for someones bedroom or college dorm room. Its not really big enough for a living room. I like how the t.v. lets you know if something is being played in 480p or 720p or 1080p. That way you never have to question why the quality  suddenly changed. I wish there were better options on how you view the screen. Due to the tv having multiple hdmi ports i can now charge my mp3 player but only while the tv is on which is really cool and it can also play files from my mp3 and slideshow pictures and videos with my mp3 player which is awesome. I could go on and on but these are all the things ive experienced so far. I will definitely buy an oCosomo tv again in the future when i decided to upgrade to a 40 inch!.

Reviews.Title: The TV sometimes has streaks in it.
Reviews.Author: Burke Plant
Reviews.Content: It occasionally has streaks in the picture. It may go days without streaking. Sometimes it streaks bad off and on. Other than that, it serves my purpose very well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J_A
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV when it was only $179 and it is well worth the buy. I see people complaining about the sound, but I personallyhave no problem with the sound on the TV. Easy set up, (comes with screwdriver and explicit instructions.) But, once its set up its good to go.

Reviews.Title: Love iT!
Reviews.Author: Krystin L Mahoney
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and sound quality.  Bought as a spare tv for my parents for a christmas and they love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Nick Stroud
Reviews.Content: Great condition. I was a little cautious when I did not recognize the brand but I was very happy with this excellent TV. Awesome quality in sound and video! Thank you.

Reviews.Title: additional tv, no complaints
Reviews.Author: sharon Dolan-Nelson
Reviews.Content: Great for bedroom. The sound is good ,picture clear and settings very easy to adjust for preference. I haven't tried additional hook-ups readily available and simple to access. I would buy another one if needed and do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Catherine Williamson
Reviews.Content: Very good color & sound.  I like the swivel feature.  I also like the dust microfiber cloth that came with the TVWould recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up
Reviews.Author: William Jaegers
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to primarily use as a monitor for my computer.Set up was easy. 9 screws to assemble the base and attach it to the TV.Connected the VGA chord and plugged it in.Clear picture, no problems at all.Could not be any happier with this set.

Reviews.Title: It beat my expectations
Reviews.Author: jomarkpro
Reviews.Content: We really like our oCOSMO.  It works way better then we expected it too.  The color is crisp and clear and bright.  The frame the TV is in is handsome and well made.  Yes the sound could be better but that's not a big deal.  Next time I am in the market for a TV I will look to see if oCOSMO is still being made and will probably by one again.

Reviews.Title: EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!!
Reviews.Author: Randy Hathoot
Reviews.Content: I needed a good tv for my master bedroom. I places my order on a Monday and received my tv on Wednesday( free shipping ). People complain about the sound and the stand, but those complaints are just plain silly! This tv cost $179.00 and it is definitely worth every penny. It has an outstanding picture, great sound and is well built. If you want to spend $400.00 on a 32" then go ahead, but honestly this tv can hang with any other in its class. Great tv, all there is to it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.. LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: TS AKA BIG MONEY!! "BO84"
Reviews.Content: This was a Great buy... I was  Very Happy with the TV, and it was everything and more as advertised... I give them a 5 Star Grade. I will Buy from tham again..

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: SAN JUANITA MENDEZ
Reviews.Content: Great picture once adjusted, volume is adequate and no problems with sound clarity. We have had a difficult time getting the  CBS channel programmed, despite having rabbit ears antenna hooked on. Great price, can't complain too much.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Frodo
Reviews.Content: The tv picture is nice and clear.  I like the port options.  The 32" works great in the bedroom.  The sounds is not great so I added external speakers.

Reviews.Title: great kids TV
Reviews.Author: Vickie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a teenager, it was easy for her to figure out and use, good product for the money

Reviews.Title: For the right buyer and the right price, it's fine
Reviews.Author: Dan Coffee
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a lightning deal and at $119 it seemed like a fun little experiment to see what automated production can achieve. At the current selling price ($200) I would have passed, but for $119 curiosity got the better of me. As it turns out, it may be worth what I paid. The sound is poor, the tuner is not very sensitive and the picture has very few things that can be adjusted, but for what I have invested, it does what I would expect it to do. It's light weight and was easy to set up, and it will be a nice bonus for my guest bedroom. Since it is a brand that hasn't been around long enough to have a reputation, it still is unproven as to how it will hold up. I doubt that I would pay the current selling price but if you catch it at a bargain price it might be worth a shot.I do update my reviews if i feel a need to, so if there's nothing added below, you can assume I'm still holding this opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great value for money
Reviews.Author: Liana C
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I expected and I am extremely happy especially considering how little it cost! A great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: E. Armendariz
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my mother in law so all the bells and whistles were not a big priority. I was surprised how good the pucture was even with just a non-hd signal. I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for an inexpensive upgrade or second TV.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Simple TV
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: This TV is a very simple but excellent TV. The picture is sharp in all of the tests that I've done. I've tested my xbox, gamecube, and Chromecast and they've all have worked fine. Another nice thing about this TV is how many ports that is included. The sound is decent enough, now it isn't as good as a $500 TV, but this isn't one of those. This is a $180 TV. I have extra speakers hooked up to it and the sound comes through smoothly. If you are looking for a 32" TV this one is a good buy so far.

Reviews.Title: Wow! The devil is in the details.
Reviews.Author: Mamalolly
Reviews.Content: Great picture, decent sounds.  Plugs right into speaker system.  Connects to computer. Easy to set up - elderly woman set it up by herself.  But the details!!!! Perfect instructions even labeling and describing which is screw type 1 and 2; includes magnetized screwdriver, and cloth to clean screen.  And for this price? WOW.  (Whoever wrote the instructions should be cloned so all manufacturers can use him or her.)

Reviews.Title: Cosmo 32" 720p
Reviews.Author: Axel Stork
Reviews.Content: Nice tv. Unbeatable for th err price. Mhl feature works well to stream content from a mobile device or a roku stick.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the price
Reviews.Author: david richthofen
Reviews.Content: Shipped by Amazon very quickly.Easy assembly and good directions. The picture, I consider to be very good, but the sound could be improved, but its not a top of the line entertainment system, but a good sound for a average bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great tv great price
Reviews.Author: Johnna Jones
Reviews.Content: Size and picture perfect for bedroom no problem connecting or setup I would recommend this tv to my friends anytime

Reviews.Title: ocosmo 32in
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: I loved this tv! Very cheap, but great quality. Bought it cyber Monday and I've been happy ever since  lol

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase!
Reviews.Author: Judy Hanscome
Reviews.Content: We picked out this TV as a Christmas gift for our daughter. It was a pretty good price for the size that it is. My husband helped her set it up with no problem and we are all very satisfied with it. Great picture clarity and sound. I recommend this TV for anyone looking to buy one.

Reviews.Title: great choice
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Larnerd
Reviews.Content: I was nicely surprised by this TV as I put it together, which was easy to do. Good picture, and it has all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: METAL
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, colors vivid and the speakers sound good.  It's not the loudest sound, but hey, what kind of sound do you expect to come from something that is FLAT?  It's not like it's a Bose, right?  I'm very satisfied with this TV.  It fits perfectly where I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv purchase!
Reviews.Author: Jamie Harper
Reviews.Content: Great tv! Purchased for use in my sons bedroom and it works great! I read other reviews on here that were negative about the sound quality of the tv and that you had to turn the tv's sound all the way up in order to hear it... I have no clue what these people are talking about. I have bad hearing and have no trouble hearing this tv on its lowest volume settings. Picture is nice and hooking gaming equipment up is easy. Wouldn't purchase for main tv in home but it makes a great secondary (bedrooms, garages, patios, ect.). The controller is a little busy and has buttons galore so if your buying for little ones you will want to get an easier controller to use. Great product and my son and family are very pleased - highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV for the price for sure.I bought two for Christmas and my kids use them everyday!The sound is great and the picture is perfect..no different than any other brand TV.

Reviews.Title: Julie k
Reviews.Author: Momof3
Reviews.Content: I got the tv in 3 days. Great! But when I opened it no power cord,remote,booklet,and it looked to have been used as a display. Called amazon after 40 min on phone. And a return label emailed to me. I will be shipped another tv. So I can't even tell you about the tv itself. We will see...

Reviews.Title: dismayed
Reviews.Author: jim dickson
Reviews.Content: waited a week for this piece of crap no screws for the stand the lcd screen was broke just light coming out very dissapointted

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: richard mcclelland
Reviews.Content: I have 3 kids and I am not looking for anything fancy for our bedroom, that's why I bought this at a relatively inexpensive price. When I got TV  and put it together it looks great! It has 3 hdmi, 1 compomemt video, 1 s-video, a vga input, a standard cable input and a a/v input. Everything we needed for satellite hook up, video games and DVD!  Its sleek and very light the directions are great and it is a great price and makes you look a lot fancier than I though. Really a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Exercise Room
Reviews.Author: texascanyon
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for our exercise room. It was cheap($179) and so far is better than I expected. The sound is okay if you adjust it. The picture is excellant. Seems like its the same company that makes the Spectre TV. I have both and both remotes work an either TV.The oCOSMO is slightly better than the Spectre, its a later version. Would buy again, and may do so.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Wife & I were looking for a new TV for our bedroom. This one worked out great. Good picture, no complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: Great set for the money.
Reviews.Author: Ed Lundin
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time and have had no problems with it.  The picture is fine but the sound is a little "tinny" or weak.  I'm going to try to hook up some better speakers to see if that improves it.  We use it at a hunting camp and the set if fine for that application.I am going to purchase another to use in a bed room.

Reviews.Title: It works for what we need
Reviews.Author: Dennis Harabin
Reviews.Content: Got it as the Kids gaming and DVD TV and it works perfect for that. Previous to buying I read complaints about the Sound and Yet we are always telling the kids turn it down and they show us it is on the lowest of settings.THERE is no volume issues with our set.

Reviews.Title: good  value
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: good value, sound so, so but can correct with sound bar. good picture. easy to operate and set up stand

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: laura ochoa
Reviews.Content: my two kids, my  girlfriend,  and  i are very happy with the tvs!!!!!  This was a  great family Christmas gift!!!

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: babycakes
Reviews.Content: My tv seems to be having dead pixels around it and I just don't like them. Other than that it's a good tv

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, Lousy Sound
Reviews.Author: Carrie & Rob
Reviews.Content: This review could have gone 2 ways: I gave it 4 stars since I was able to hook the TV up an old receiver and center speaker and is as decent quality. Without that option I'd have given it 2 stars at best. The built-in "speakers" have very limited range, absolutely no lower frequencies and not very loud.On the plus side the image quality is pretty good especially for the price. I'm amazed at how light the unit is and it easily mounted to the wall. Setup was easy, to has plenty of input options and overall operation is fine. Just don't expect to enjoy your viewing experience if you don't have another way to produce sound.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO!
Reviews.Author: J. Considine
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a gift for grandma. I had never heard of this brand and was hesitant to buy it, but am glad that I did. It is a nice looking TV. It works and looks great. Definitely a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Shelly8258
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for the price.  It is perfect for a bedroom.  I have FIOS, and have had no issues with the sound as noted in some of the other reviews.  I highly reccommend this TV,

Reviews.Title: good buy.
Reviews.Author: Kailey
Reviews.Content: So far I have no issues with this TV. The only thing that may be a slight problem is that I can't figure out how to plug in the Wii and DVD player at the same time, but that cam very easily be chalked up to me knowing nothing about electronics. Besides that, the pictures good, the sound is good and that's all I need to say it's great! Haha

Reviews.Title: great price!
Reviews.Author: Bridget Walls "camper heaven"
Reviews.Content: What can I say I got this t.v. for $89 bucks,It works awesome with games but you do need a h.d.source for best picture.It is thin and light so you can hang it anywhere. Bought the Videosecu led t.v.wall mount with swivel articulating arm for $26 and had t.v.installed on wall in 10 minutes.Total cost with tax..$123 for a 32"led t.v and awesome wall mount that i can position almost anywhere,thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for my son for Christmas. Had no problems with shipping, arrived on time, looks great, sounds great, and got a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Jen "Book Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: This model was on sell during the Black Friday '13 holiday season and I picked up one for my kids. I should have gotten 2! First let me say, the shipping was extremely fast! I received this item, which came to my door and not the post office, in 2 days.The TV has a sharp, bright picture which is great for watching 720p HD video (if 720p is great so is 1080p). I had it next to my Westington House 32" 720p TV and hooked up my laptop to it and watched a few Netflix movies and episodes. I was very pleased to see that the picture quality was the same if not better. The sound is a bit empty but I run everything audio through wireless speakers anyway, which means I never use the TV's speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Lacy Strader
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace an old tv in our bedroom and it serves its purpose. I had read some complaints about sound, but it seems to be just fine to me. The only thing we're not to crazy about is we can't get the 2 black vertical bars on the side to go away. Overall I would say if you need an inexpensive extra tv for a guest room or bedroom it's a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Swish
Reviews.Content: This tv has been great for the week i have owned it, only thing I wish it had a optical audio output. Its not a real big deal considering I paid 159 bucks shipped to my door. The tv is perfect for my weight room. Stand could be more sturdy but it totally fine for me .

Reviews.Title: Works just fine
Reviews.Author: Mark "Mark"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a "bedroom tv" about two months ago . I can't really speak for it's dependability yet, but It works just fine so far. I paid just over $100  for it during the black Friday lightning deals so you really can't beat the price.  There were a few customer reviews complaining about the picture and sound quality.  In my experience the sound is just fine.  My only complaint in fact, is that the very lowest the volume will go is still a bit too loud when you're trying not to wake the person next to you.And, while the picture maybe isn't quite as sharp as the one on my $1,000+ LG* in the living room,  it's still pretty dang sharp.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt H
Reviews.Content: Great picture, the sound is not very good but after adjusting in the settings it is ok.  If you have Direct tv you can not program your remote to control this tv which is not the tv's fault but direct tv's for not adding the programing code.

Reviews.Title: Second  t.v. for family room
Reviews.Author: marygarrett
Reviews.Content: I just wished it had a DVD built into it. All in all it has great sound and visual. And I don't like surveys.

Reviews.Title: TV OCosmo 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: rebecca mcclean
Reviews.Content: I think this TV is wonderful for the money. I was hesitant b/c I had not heard of the brand but it has a beautiful clear picture and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice TV at a great price.

Reviews.Title: TV is great
Reviews.Author: KIM J HATCH
Reviews.Content: The TV is great although the remote control only works every once in a while which I will check on.

Reviews.Title: Holiday Bargain
Reviews.Author: Halo Fan
Reviews.Content: I only bought this brand because it was a holiday bargain and i got a great deal on it, however once I recieved this TV I was very impressed, not only is it sharp looking and crystal clear but also very slim.  Had I known then what I know now i would have bought three of them!I love this TV and highly recomend it to anyone considering buying it.

Reviews.Title: but it now!!
Reviews.Author: Kerron Khan
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV, best bang for buck..Color is nice and clean,  very thin and light, sound is ok for me.Dont delay, buy now..

Reviews.Title: Great tv, terrible sound
Reviews.Author: Christine Rothgeb
Reviews.Content: This tv so far has been a great purchase for the price, the only problem I have had is the really terrible sound quality. But this is fairly common with flat screens, so I just hooked up some other speakers I had lying around.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Joey China
Reviews.Content: Got this for the kids room. works beautifully. You can't beat the price anywhere. Thinking of getting an additional one for the garage/office. Wouldn't have this as my Main TV but absolutely for a spare bedroom or extra.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price...and arrived only 30 hours after I placed my order!!!
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: So far, so good!  Second TV for the bedroom with PS2 hooked up.  Glad I stumbled upon such a good deal!

Reviews.Title: great picture and price- just right for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: Really good picture that for the price would be hard to beat.  This was purchased for a kids bedroom and is the perfect fit.  The lack of 5 stars is due the terrible remote.  While it will work, it takes several attempts at pressing the same button to get a response.  This isn't a big issue for myself as I'm using a different remote which works fine.  One note-  if programming a universal remote you will likely not find a code oCOSMO.  oCOSMO utilizes SONY universal remote codes.  No problem programming once you know that.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy For The Price
Reviews.Author: antonio castro
Reviews.Content: It was a relatively good picture for 720p display, but the sound quality was poor, I think that by attaching a sound you can fix the sound problem. I only paid $180 for it, and for that price and size, I'm happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: RENE BONILLA
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a "Lightning Deal" on Amazon for $125 so I can't complain to much. The TV has decent picture and sound. No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: for the price
Reviews.Author: Omar Gomez
Reviews.Content: Is great for the price you paid since other are more expensive and with less quality, go for it is good

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the deal
Reviews.Author: L spinn
Reviews.Content: Nice tv for the price it was a Black Friday special . I don't have any issues that the previous reviews had . It was$ 116.00 tv

Reviews.Title: 32-inch Cosmo TV
Reviews.Author: nancy gau
Reviews.Content: I only paid $119 for this TV.  I got it in a speed deal from Amazon.  For the price it is super.  I would definitely recommend it for anyone wanting a 32 inch TV.

Reviews.Title: Cosmo 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: John Martin
Reviews.Content: The TV functions as advertised.  I would have given it 5 stars except of the sound quality.  It's adequate for what I wanted, however, as a main TV one would be wise to use external speakers.  All in all, a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV we are lovin this
Reviews.Author: Joan Gordon
Reviews.Content: We love this TV picture is great and yes the sound is not the best. Our grandson helped with that problem by hooking our sound to our boze radio. We are older people and are not tech saavy so we were delighted with this. This was our Christmas present to ourselves and we feel we really got a good deal the price was in our range of affordability.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Frances Click
Reviews.Content: great size for where we put it.  hooked to satellite, so a little slow to respond when first turned on. changes channels fast and fine.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Annette Barr
