Reviews.Content: Yes it did. Great buy! Was needing a 2 nf TV for my husbands job and didn't want to spend much so this was great. Picture is clear and great.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv for the money
Reviews.Author: JP'slady
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture good sound no complaints especially for the money. Very thin and lightweight does look smaller than 32 but think that is due to the small bezel.

Reviews.Title: Nice, Lightweight TV
Reviews.Author: cpbino
Reviews.Content: So far this has been a good television.  The picture is good though not as vivid as our other, more expensive one.  The biggest draw back is the sound but it is acceptable.  The TV is very light and easy to move and has a swivel base which makes it nice in the bedroom.  Over all, a good TV for the price.  As a bonus, it comes ready for a Roku Stick that will turn the TV into a semi-smart television.  I have not tried that yet but may in the future if the price of the Roku Stick drops.

Reviews.Title: Best buy Ever!!
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: Because im so happy!!  Was my First experience and was amazing!! Definitly Will recommend!  Good quality, nice price and excellent screen.

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: Tomkat67
Reviews.Content: My son got one of these at Christmastime for his bedroom. Hanging up there on the wall, the picture is sharp and clear. I thought the sound was pretty good for such small speakers but "Mr. Audio" bought a sound bar for it which I must admit sounds great. He uses a Chromecast to stream Netflix and Youtube to the TV which works really good. I've never heard of oCOSMO as a brand before but so far I'm quite satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: super buy
Reviews.Author: lois reeves
Reviews.Content: sharp picture, you can not beat the hundred dollar price tag for this TV; sound is nice easy setup no problems so far, never heard of this brand before but it works for me.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Madi Madly
Reviews.Content: We've only had this TV for a couple of months, but the picture is crystal clear, and the quality is every bit as good as that of our $1000 50".

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: mecabman
Reviews.Content: picture is better than what i thought it would be.  great buy (got it for $120 on a special )

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Koflanovich
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, no complaints at all!  Don't be afraid of the unknown name!  Not sure if it is made by Sony but you need to use Sony codes for cable.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Leah Horan
Reviews.Content: Awesome deal. Quality picture. Good color. Even fast action movies flow seamlessly. Only negative.... horrible sound. Easy fix... external speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for my mothers Xmas
Reviews.Author: Blake Swain
Reviews.Content: I have had no complaints and this was easy enough for my mother to hook up all by herself, so again I say  "no complaints here". BTW I mentioned from other reviews the questionable sound, and she said "the sound is great".

Reviews.Title: TV exceeds expectation
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Cote "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The TV was presented as a gift to my son and replaced his old analog console Curtis Mathis.  He is extremely impressed with the video quality.  The audio is more than adequate.  He has installed the TV in his living room and is using an external antenna.  He doubted that the reception would be as good as it turned out.  I installed a very good antenna that is hightly directional, but we settled on a compromise direction to point it at and he is pulling in eighteen channels.  The greatest plus side is that they are all free.  The remote is very functional as it has all of the necessary controls and more.  He has connected a DVD player that broadens the choices.  Great TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for kids
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A. Bullard
Reviews.Content: We put this TV in our kids room for video games. So far it's been great. A lot of people complained about volume problems but we haven't noticed any soundd problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jack Bailey
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the picture & sound quality. Perfect TV for the basement where the kids can game & watch movies..

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the right price
Reviews.Author: don ball
Reviews.Content: I got this on the lightning deal and so i only paid around $119 for the tv.  The picture is very nice and the sound is a little off until you mess with the setting and find one that you suits you.  I would not hesitate to purchase this tv again.  It is for our bedroom so it isn't the main tv which i don't think this tv is made to be.  this is a great bedroom or spare room tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: GatorKindle
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my girlfriend and it replaced her old 25 inch box set.  She loves it.  I hadn't had a chance to play with it yet, however its not mine so No pros or cons as she will only be using it to watch TV as its her bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Bible "Fishing nut"
Reviews.Content: I use this tv in a spare room, but for the price it's great & seems to be a very nice tv.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price.
Reviews.Author: John Samuel Hubbard
Reviews.Content: For the price, I couldn't ask for much more. Good clear picture, plenty of ports and sounds is ok. The sound is actually my only "complaint" and I'm not really complaining. The TV is in my bedroom. There is plenty of sound for that location but I could see it being a problem in a larger room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: *** I bought this for my daughters room and it is a Great TV for Kids room!! *** Great Purchase

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price.
Reviews.Author: James E. Murray "Love Fancy Gizmos"
Reviews.Content: Has an excellent picture and is a good bedroom TV.  So far I am pleased with the purchase and may get another one for the guest bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Totally Love IT!
Reviews.Author: Becky White
Reviews.Content: My husband was so happy with his Christmas gift. The only draw back was the sound. It sounded like it was coming out of a tin can so we ordered the sound bar and it is wonderful. My husband doesn't need to turn it up as loud. He is so happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend this product
Reviews.Author: Julie Ritch
Reviews.Content: I have haf this tv fot at least a month and had no problems out of it what so ever.  For the price it is an amazing deal.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly lightweigh
Reviews.Author: Michael Becker
Reviews.Content: Bought this on Cyber Monday for my mom.  She has a 15" laptop she uses and, now that she's 65, her vision isn't what it used to be.  Thought this would be a nice monitor for her, easier for her to read.So far, it has been a good purchase.  I couldn't believe how light it was.  Not really sure if that is unique to the brand or if all  flat screens are constructed to be this light now.  I haven't purchased a flat screen for myself in 12 months, it was a 40" LED and considerably heavier.  Anyway, b/c of the weight, she can move it easily to clean, and I don't have to worry about her moving it.The couple times I've used it, the picture seems to be pretty good.  I played with the picture a little bit when I set it up.  For what she needs, it's more than adequate.The stand also has a nice pivot feature so it is very easy to turn the screen on an angle.  If I had to guess, I would say it turns 35-45 degrees either way.Only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is the packaging for shipping.  I get money has to be saved whenever possible, but to ship a 32" TV in it's manufacturer display box, especially at Christmastime with all the delivery thefts, seems kind of.....not smart.  Luckily I was able to keep track at work and get to it w/in 30 minutes of delivery.Other than that, if you can get this at a good price ($120 Cyber Monday, free shipping), it's well worth the purchase!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kern
Reviews.Content: The picture is not all together there. Like at the bottom of the screen you see the station logo, well on this one it is only half visable. I tried different types of picture options and no change.The remote is terrible. It feels cheap and does not work more than half the time. Well I guess you get what you pay for and thats the case here.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Bill Barnard
Reviews.Content: I bought this television to replace an older model.  It has a very good picture and was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Small green DOT in the middle of screen
Reviews.Author: Ed Rowell
Reviews.Content: Received my TV, set it up and Noticed a Small green DOT in the middle of screen. guess its a dead pixel? Other than that the Picture is really nice. The Volume is not that good but good enough for a small bedroom. Not sure if i should try returning it because of the dead pixel. Don't wanna pay for shipping it back.

Reviews.Title: ocosmo is the truth
Reviews.Author: coonie
Reviews.Content: So far what I can see this is a great tv (knock on wood) but I love it great picture I think ocosmo got a great future ahead of them I put this tv up there with the best (vizio,samsung,etc) and the price is a bonus !!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV & Great Price!!
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a Christmas present for my son, but wish I would of got one for myself too! The picture and sound are great, once you adjust it to your liking. I did take out the extended warranty, but I usually do on items like this. Will be looking at buying one for myself in the near future.

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: la mar shepherd jr
Reviews.Content: The TV is pretty good. It's placed inside enclosed media cabinet so the small speaker's amplified by the enclosure, I'm satisfied with that. I use apple TV and Nintendo wii games on it. works great for this:) Good cheap price and the setup was easy. I have a larger LED TV which was double the price, it works the same but the speakers are better for my movies and 2nd Apple TV.  Basically, the cheap price has a sacrifice - the sound. Any techie customer expecting this oCOSMO TV to perform the same or better features as a more expensive LED TV should consider buying that higher end model TV and be done with it. Or invest in a good speaker system which will remedy the problem EASY:)

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Kemoy Miller
Reviews.Content: Well if you are looking for a great deal oCOSMO is THE way. The sound quality is not 100% but it is workable. The picture quality is also great for the low cost.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: best*seller
Reviews.Content: Really nice and thin TV for the money I paid for it. Would recommend it. My son plays his XBOX 30 on it just fine.

Reviews.Title: My first TV
Reviews.Author: Laure Jean
Reviews.Content: I like this TV  a lot. This is the first time I ever used this brand. So far, I am satisfied. It high deph, and a good size.

Reviews.Title: Works for what we need, good deal for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: This was bought for the family room. We are not a bunch of tv watchers so this works for us. The sound is a bit low and not very loud, but I plan on hooking up external speakers so that will help.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Evans
Reviews.Content: The tv is extremely light, the base was easy to put together, and looks great. Picture quality is HD for the games, and it meets all of my needs as far as a family tv. Only dislike I can think of is that I wish the hdmi port had more space beneath it - the tv's frame comes out and obstructs bulky plugin devices like the Chromecast. But small potatoes considering. Other than that, I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: kim sessions
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv as a Christmas gift and we just got it set up today. The picture is great and quality seems to be good set up was a breeze they even included a screw driver. so far its been a great purchase

Reviews.Title: looks great!
Reviews.Author: antony
Reviews.Content: for a low price, this tv is worth it, great picture, but dont expect something as great as LG and Samsung similar size models. im happy with the tv. though it did arrive with a dead pixel in the middle of the screen. and theres a rattling sound inside of my remote control. but it works fine and im satisfied

Reviews.Title: Awesome OCOSMO Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: shareka
Reviews.Content: This flat screen TV is Awesome. Would recommend anyone to get it. Great for a movie night with the kids.

Reviews.Title: Great for Roku Streaming Stick
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a bedroom and I love that I can stream video and control my Roku stick with the included remote. The picture quality is decent for the small size, but I would not recommend above a 32".

Reviews.Title: oCosmo TV
Reviews.Author: Dana M. Westcott "emma bella"
Reviews.Content: The Sound of the TV is not that great, however the picture is descent.  Overall for the price not a bad TV

Reviews.Title: Full featured at a low price
Reviews.Author: SoggyInSeattle
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying our TV as a bedroom set.  Looks great and feels well built. The speakers are loud and clear but lack the fullness of a home theater system.  It has lots of features to play advanced internet content with a variety of media players (Roku, AppleTV, etc)I was surprised at all the input/output options this TV has; more than the usual found at this size and price.I'd buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: Clifford Veit
Reviews.Content: everything works as advertised, and is a great deal for the price! I am thoroughly pleased with this product. I will recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: great tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: J. Montano
Reviews.Content: This tv has it all, low price, quality, and overall nicely put together. No 3d or any streaming capability, but who cares? By using an HDMI to connect my laptop I have no need for it AND i save about $100 by not buying the fancier tv. BTW, loved the screwdriver that was included, which made setup quick, it was a pleasant surprise.

Reviews.Title: teal's TV
Reviews.Author: D Lurz
Reviews.Content: sound is IFY. but other wise it is good. I useing it to make Vidio Game sound track and game screens. It would work better for that if I had desktop Computer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the picture, sound and overall quality of this TV. I bought it for a rental place but would use this in my own home. Can't beat the price (I paid $178) for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for a good price
Reviews.Author: MoJoe
Reviews.Content: Great for the price.  Good picture.  Sound is a good level for LED TVs that usually seem to have cheap speakers.

Reviews.Title: So far -- so good
Reviews.Author: begorra
Reviews.Content: As far as I know, this is a good product - the expectation of a television is clear picture, good sound and ease of operation -  The true test comes down the road after a year or two and it still is trouble-free.  We'll hold off on our hand-clapping till then.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: ashlee jenks
Reviews.Content: the stand was easy to put together , and the reviews talking about the sound I personally think are super dramatic. I changed the sound setting to dynamic and that helps balance out the sound but otherwise I don't even notice any issues with sound. this tv is perfect I have it in my bedroom . I wish you could use it with the roku itself though you have to have the usb roku . oh well! :) It's perfect!

Reviews.Title: Sound issues
Reviews.Author: Jessica Aguilar
Reviews.Content: If the sound were a little better, I'd give it 5 stars. Other than that, great t.v. for a great price.

Reviews.Title: really nice tv
Reviews.Author: fatbobhd
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv for our bedroom, and was a bit skeptical because of the price.  The picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to everyone. It is a good TV for the price. Easy setup, good picture and sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but will work
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not great very pixley. And when it arrived it had a piece of trash under the screen that I cannot get to go away it's like it's something stuck there making a black line. It's cheap and you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Robin Tullous
Reviews.Content: So far this TV is great!! Good picture, sound and easy hookup for our teenager to use her mobile device with it!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Lena Salcido
Reviews.Content: It was easy to install, clear picture, good sound, looks nice in my son' s room. Works perfectly with his WII and DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Perfect In Price Range
Reviews.Author: Atul
Reviews.Content: It is a very good TV in This Price Range. Very Good Picture Quality. Lot of Interfaces and connectivity options. Also includes a MHL HDMI port. Easy to setup. Loving it.

Reviews.Title: oCosmo 32 inch
Reviews.Author: K. Ruple
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on cyber Monday for 119.00. I was a bit skeptical of the brand. Well it turns out that I am very pleased with the purchase. I bought this for my 16 yr. old sons room to play video games. He says the picture is excellent and that he can hook up a computer too. My only negative was purchasing only one.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the money- especially for young gamers!
Reviews.Author: Jana Burks
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our son to play his video games. The graphics are very good and he uses headphones, so sound quality is not an issue. We also purchased the Roku which works great with this TV!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: ton saelee
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price!! I will buy more if the price drops just like it did on cyber monday.

Reviews.Title: Seems Good!
Reviews.Author: AW
Reviews.Content: We're a week into having this TV set up, and all seems well - no surprises - which kinda surprised me, since we got this for such an amazing price - I figured we'd hate it.  Seems to be great.

Reviews.Title: 32" tv
Reviews.Author: Geraldine Weber
Reviews.Content: The price was fantastic.  The picture is great and I have fios and the tv does good with this service.  I would recommend this to anyone who wanted a high quality product that is very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Great buy and quality..!!!
Reviews.Author: Johnte Langley III
Reviews.Content: So very happy with the tv....Great quality and was so freaking cheap..!!!easy to set up ..!With my bluray I couldn't be any more happier....... Thankyiu

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: johnsocrates
Reviews.Content: People complain and complain about the quality, the picture the sound.  I paid $119 on cyber monday!!!!!  Even at the everyday price it's a great deal!!!  The tv serves it's purpose well as a bedroom tv.  It puts me to sleep.

Reviews.Title: Best TV you will find for the money.
Reviews.Author: Jason V.
Reviews.Content: Got it to go on the back patio to watch football and the picture and sound are perfect.  Don't expect home theater sound but it's use you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: Leon Liburd
Reviews.Content: This tv is really good. I use it to play video games like battlefield 4 and fifa 14 on my ps4. I have no problem with the sound. My only complaint is that  this tv should have had a game mode. At first the video was too dark, but i solved this by manually adjusting the picture settings. The pre-set settings were just too dark for me. This waS such a great deal that i ended up buying 2 more of these.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: SANDRA LOZOYA
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING IS OKAY ;), arrived on time and it is working very well.Maybe I think to buy another one very soon, since I would like one a little bit bigger

Reviews.Title: Great for 179 bucks
Reviews.Author: vanatta7
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy about it but it gives a nice pic with decent sound. Loses a star because there could be mor user settings but for our gaming we have no trouble with the factory settings!

Reviews.Title: Awesome produtct...very happy!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: This product is much more than I expected bought two and very happy with the tv's nice quality and I plan to buy more!  Great Price too!

Reviews.Title: Good television - 1 bad pixel
Reviews.Author: T. Smith
Reviews.Content: Purchased this during the Black Friday - cyber Monday sales. Good budget television, it has decent sound and nice picture. It did have one bad pixel but it isn't too bad I've not heard too many complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Lial Gingell
Reviews.Content: It does what it's supposed to do. Not much more I can say about it. It's a damn good TV.

Reviews.Title: Can't Be Beat for The Cost.
Reviews.Author: Constant Chef
Reviews.Content: On Christmas Day I rethought where we were going to place the Xbox One - since we had an older 21" inch HDTV, I figured I would look on Amazon for a "Reasonably Priced" television. So with the price at $159.99 and free shipping with Prime, and $18.00 for a SquareTrade Three Year Warranty - how can I go wrong? Amazon has put themselves behind oCosmo products, and dealing with Amazon has always been hassle-free for me.I received the TV after a couple of days - when I lifted the box I was surprised to how light it was. By the looks, it looks just as good if not better than the other six HDTV's I have in the house of assorted brands.I plugged the Xbox One in, and immediately was up and running - with three HDMI's, thats awesome. I played Netflix from the Xbox on the television, and got totally immersed in the movie without thinking about the TV I was watching it on.The manual is detailed and actually nicely printed on glossy paper, and everything is packed inside a heavier than most zip-lock bag. This may seem like it shouldn't affect the review, but it shows you that it wasn't skimpy in packaging, and there was an investment for this to catch your eye and feel comfortable about your purchase that this isn't just a "Fly-by-night company".PROS:Lightweight, especially since I am mounting it on the wall;Crisp picture for a 720p 60MzH;Cost factor;3 HDMI PortsCONS:Internal Speakers;No Optical Audio;Still a 720p 60 MzHAs stated in the cons and by other reviews, the sound quality from the internal speaks are weak - but if you're purchasing a $160 HDTV, what would you expect? And - I purchased the LG Sound bar for $72, I tossed that on with the use of 3.5mm jacks plugged into the headphones since the sound bar has no RCA jacks, and the TV has no optical outputs.Wrapping it up, I believe that for the investment, and since we are using it for game use, and with a $18 three-year warranty added on, its a no-brainer - I would recommend this unit as an add-on system, if you're a college student, or simply on a budget and want the best bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Laurie R.
Reviews.Content: The TV was in perfect condition and is working so well. A good deal! It is working great and the HD is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: All the right features at a great price
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Anderau
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for a guest room that gets very infrequent use. Once we saw the picture, we traded it for the set in the master bedroom! It has a great picture and all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: I use it as my Monitor
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Great TV I'm using it as my monitor I bought it for bedroom to watch I had a another 23" TV w/ DVD as my monitor, I said I didn't need a DVD combo for my monitor, I love it it's Huge as my monitor I'm ready to buy another maybe Two, Nice picture and the Sound is Excellent

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jay Atkins
Reviews.Content: Nice tv, works great! Speakers aren't the best, but over nice. Willing to recommend to friends and family anytime or DAY

Reviews.Title: Great  buy.
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I  bought this tv i  was kind of wondering but once i  had it up and going wow  great  picture, sound and works with Sony products. great.

Reviews.Title: A gift for my grandson and he loves it - only used it a couple of days now
Reviews.Author: hunter
Reviews.Content: From what I can tell he is loving it - it replaced one and he is hooked up and playing games - streaming videos etc.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Fred Bonadonna
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy. Very nice picture. This is perfect for the bedroom. Would recommend this TV, for the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: He says it is great!
Reviews.Author: R. Champagne
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my son and he loves it.  It arrived in record time so he got use out of it well before Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price!
Reviews.Author: FloB
Reviews.Content: Picked this up on a Black Friday daily deal for a great price. As soon as the gifts were opened we hooked it up in his bedroom.  5 minutes and we were good to go - Easy Peasy!  We did not wall mount this - it is on his gaming stand.  The swivel base is great - one turn for viewing on the bed - one for gaming.He has it hooked up to cable, the PS3 and his gaming chair already.  Good clear picture and sound for both TV viewing and gaming.Very satisifed with this purchase - may have to get one for my office - time for an upgrade!

Reviews.Title: Surprising clarity from a 720p 60 Hz TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony T "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter's bedroom to hook up to her existing Roku.  The TV weighs very little and has a very good picture even compared to my much more expensive set.  It also contains tons of connections/ports for the price such as 3 HDMI ports.  Very good value.

Reviews.Title: LOVIN IT!
Reviews.Author: Erica Brown
Reviews.Content: I love my new oCOSMO HDTV.  I am really enjoying watching my favorite shows and movies.  Got it at a great price and I am sooo very glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Defective Remote and so far no help
Reviews.Author: Texas Bridget
Reviews.Content: I hooked up my son's tv this morning for Christmas, and it has a defective remote, the springs are loose and will not get a connection unless you rotate the batteries. I tried new batteries to be sure they were not the problem.I called Amazon, as always, their customer support was great, however, Amazon is not selling remotes for this TV, and could not locate a replacement remote on oCosmos website.I tried to call oCosmo, and was placed in a customer support loop. The message did not say if they were closed for Christmas, I will try to get in touch with them tomorrow and see if they will send a replacement remote. I believe this remote should be at no charge since it was defective upon receipt.Will update review as to what the manufacturer does.... Amazon said if they need to, they will replace the entire shipment....

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Joilanda Cosby
Reviews.Content: I got this for our living room and it was super easy to put together and its a great tv

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: cynthia hill
Reviews.Content: Had a little difficulty trying to get the tv for Christmas as a gift for my family. Easy set up. It took about 4 min. The sound and picture settings needed adjusting, as mentioned in previous reviews, but after that all was perfect. Best purchase!!! Also the base swivels it is all good. Netflix works quickly for me.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: deborah elharar
Reviews.Content: what a crystal clear picture, wow TV time is fun again, my little girls told me Mom the colors are really bright

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: CCE
Reviews.Content: I was amazed for the price.  Beautiful picture and sound is even pretty good.  They have a nice remote and even include a nice screw driver to mount the base.  They make reference to another mfr that starts with an S in the manual, so I think they may have help making it.  It looks like a much more expensive set and we bought 2.  Wish I would have bought more

Reviews.Title: OCosmo 32-inch
Reviews.Author: monroe jenkins jr.
Reviews.Content: Crispy  clear picture. Sound up right. Just the right price for my guest room.  The right size and easy to put together.

Reviews.Title: Man Cave
Reviews.Author: M. Kane "Marie K"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for the other half's "man cave", the one he had was old and in bad shape, age. He likes it very much. I am pleased how sharp and clear the picture is and the sound is nice and clear.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great price
Reviews.Author: W. Breton
Reviews.Content: I have owned this tv for 2 weeks . For everyone who is complaining about the sound, its not the tv... ITS THE SETTINGSmine has awesome sound quality ,bass,treble etc. Its great for gaming and just general tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Xmas gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This was a gift I wanted to surprise my husband with because it came roku ready. It's incredibly light to say that both my 80 year old grandma was able to carry it and me being 8 1/2 months pregnant. My husband set it up quickly and with ease and has not stop using it since we got it. The roku streaming stick was a breeze to set up with the tv and honestly I have no complaints.  I am very happy with this tv and the sound is fine I think if you look I'm the settings you will also find the sound suitable, HAPPY BUYING AND HAPPY HOLIDAYS !

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: nordel edgecombe
Reviews.Content: excellent product especially for the money and the sound isnt bad at all.... its like ppl expect theater sound system

Reviews.Title: Worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Deb Ferry
Reviews.Content: I had my nephew-in-law hook up the tv and we really like it.  For the price, the picture is great, a phillip screwdriver was included for the minimal amount required to put it together and using a Sony code, the remote worked the first time.  The sound is good but our previous tv had stereo surround sound so we were spoiled but again, for the price, this works great!  Would recommend it if you aren't a real picky, into detailed, electronic type person.

Reviews.Title: Good Cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: I got this tv as a lightening deal, and am vary happy with it for the price. It has three HDMI ports with on of them being MHL which means that you can hook up a roku stick or similar device, and it will be powered by the port. The picture looks good. It is only 720p, but at 32 inch I can tell the difference between it and 1080.

Reviews.Title: TV is Good.
Reviews.Author: AAina
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is okay. It meets my basic needs. I was not happy with the fact that the power cord was missing in the packaging. Also, the mounting parts are not staple. You may want to by more nails to ensure that the mounting stand fits. I'm happy that I brought the 2year warranty for this product...

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV buy it.....
Reviews.Author: Ramon Shaw
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV buy it.....I you need an inexpensive TV this is the one for you....Excellent picture and sound, I'll get another for my other spare room

Reviews.Title: liked it
Reviews.Author: donna w.
Reviews.Content: Sounds not perfect,,but for price...my son loves it!!!! Not bad at all for Xmas! Free shipping too !!! Hsppy camper

Reviews.Title: nice picture with a few cons but I can handle the small issues for the price
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Nice picture. Ok sound. Only downfall is remote issues. Use Sony remote codes to program your (cable dvr ) remote to this tv. Must have included remote pointed directly at sensor to operate the remote included. Kinda annoying to have to be spot on to get response rather than pointing in general area of tv like most

Reviews.Title: As always, delivery was very fast.
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: This is a really good TV for the price, i am giving it 4 stars just because the sound is not as good as other TVs. My sister and brother in law loved their new TV.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture
Reviews.Author: Andrea W Miller
Reviews.Content: What I expected, a clear picture and it was easy to assemble. It is very good for the inexpensive price!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mike Renfro
Reviews.Content: this is a great tv for the price, easy to setup and program, uses the sony code to program the remote on xfininty

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: tex dad99
Reviews.Content: This item was for my childrens room for Christmas so they could see their video games better and was as advertised

Reviews.Title: GOOD VALUE
Reviews.Author: Kevin Knutson
Reviews.Content: good tv! great picture for the $ sound is a little iffy but i have speakers that are hooked up to it so it was not an issue. i would recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Price, but...
Reviews.Author: C. B. Gurney
Reviews.Content: We got a great deal on this with Cyber Monday sale, but I would have been more critical if we paid full price.  The picture is decent on HD channels, but standard broadcasts (especially sports) come in rather hazy with wavy lines and some blurring.  Still, I feel like we got more than we paid for and for a second TV in the bedroom, I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Spudz
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for a bedroom!  The price is right, has a lot of inputs (this is not Wifi enabled) but does have a good picture, bright, easy to set-up.  The sound as others have mentioned has something to be desired, but for a bedroom... it's perfect!!!  Has a nice remote but if you use a cable box remote, it is compatible with SONY universal remote control codes.

Reviews.Title: Quality vs cost
Reviews.Author: Brian G.
Reviews.Content: It's a very good HDTV, it's still new but for now I'm happy with this HDTV. I recommend it for any use in the home.

Reviews.Title: amazing quality
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture, awesome quality for the price! The only down side is that in my house of boys I worry that the stand isn't sturdy enough and will probably get a wall mount for it.

Reviews.Title: Buy It
Reviews.Author: Marc Jacobs
Reviews.Content: This tv is a must buy for the price. I use it as my computer monitor, as a major PC gamer and I have no complaints. The MHL jack is a extra bonus. I plug my samsung galaxy mega in and play on the big screen. just awesome.

Reviews.Title: ... thought there was no way it would be as good as name brand tv's
Reviews.Author: Robin L.
Reviews.Content: when we got this tv we thought there was no way it would be as good as name brand tv's. Boy was we wrong. This tv has a great picture and many functions. We have only had it for half a day so I can't really give much info. But for the price it is a excellent tv. I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Remotes weakness
Reviews.Author: BigAl "BigAl"
Reviews.Content: The problem with the remote is in the remote itself not the remotes receiver in the TV. As someone else pointed out, you need to point the remote directly at the TV for it to work. Since this oCosmos TV uses Sony codes and I have an old Sony TV, I tested my old Sony remote and it works as you would expect. You do not have to point it directly at the TV, there is a good amount of range up/down and side to side. I do like the layout of the oCosmos remote and don't think it appears cheap as others have pointed out, but this weak beam thing is maddening at times. So stupid to cut corners here on an otherwise really nice TV.  Maybe oCosmos will offer we owners a free replacement remote control.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Hall
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV through Amazon via flash sale at $119 on Cyber Monday. To this point it looks like a great TV. The picture is as clear as any I have ever owned. I have had no problems with the sound as some others have indicated. The sound has been crystal clear. The base was simple to put together and attach. Took just a few minutes. Overall you can beat the price for the quality of TV I have gotten. very happy, so far, with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product...concerned about shipping
Reviews.Author: Jennifer A. Raether
Reviews.Content: Prompt delivery. Tv works great. Shipper just left it at our front door. To me that is dangerous. If I were the shipper I would have had to have someone sign for this type of package to make sure it got to its destination. Pretty spendy/risky to leave at someones front door.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: ibrahim
Reviews.Content: i was worried about the sound because of what other people have told me. But the tv is awesome and the sound is awesome. Enough said. I baught it for 160 and its probably the best purchase of the year for me.

Reviews.Title: Warped areas of screen makes some text blurry
Reviews.Author: Alec Immerman
Reviews.Content: There were 5 inches or so horizontally where the pixels are warped from top to bottom of the screen which made text a bit blurry and hard to read.  Still functional, good price - you get what you pay for.  I probably could have complained or returned it but I knew what I was getting myself into.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO is a Fantastic Find and the price was wonderful:
Reviews.Author: Chris B.
Reviews.Content: Easy right out of the box set-up. Picture is real nice. Sound is loud and clear. Just wish remote would have had lights backing up the buttons not easy to use in a dark room and it's kinda big to have to hold in one hand. Everything else is Great about the oCOSMO. I'm giving this 5 stars even if the remote is to big and dark.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Seems to be worth the price. Nice picture. Would recommend this to anyone who wants a low priced flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: unexpected quality from a no name tv brand
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: this tv is easy set up and you can't beat this picture quality for this price.  the sound is great for a 32" tv.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Donyell
Reviews.Content: Sounds a little low quality, but its definitely worth the price. I like it. It is Perfect for my room.

Reviews.Title: Great deal Great TV!
Reviews.Author: savvy
Reviews.Content: I finally was able to make the switch from a fat back TV to a flat screen TV! I got this TV on a cyber monday deal for only $120!. It has a great picture and works great with my ROKU. The sound isn't the best but it's not awful, you can hear your show its just that sometimes the show gets really loud in parts and you have to turn it down, by the time you turn it down its gone soft again. it really depends on the show that you are watching and how the show was programmed because it doesn't happen on all of my shows. I really like this TV especially for the price that I got it at. It will serve its purpose with me!

Reviews.Title: Great 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Mim
Reviews.Content: Can it get better for a 32 in. TV with a great price, great picture. It is  Truly a great buy.

Reviews.Title: A+++++
Reviews.Author: jermaine
Reviews.Content: Great picture is perfect sound is good and no complain of sound quality. would love to buy again if given the chance.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Alvin
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. The sound is a little iffy other than that this tv is great for me.

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Frink
Reviews.Content: Have had this item for about two days now and have no complaints at all. Good picture, good sound, easy to use, five stars

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo 32 inch led/hdtv television
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: For the price. I could not pass up this deal. Plus all of its features. It is a really nice television for the price. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: GREAT tv for the money
Reviews.Author: kimberly
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture.  Sound quality needs major improvement.  The sound goes up and down.  I have volume @ 90% trying to watch a movie.  Going to do some research to see if a sound bar will correct the problem.

Reviews.Title: Decent television
Reviews.Author: Suzette D.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from the Cyber Monday flash sale to replace the old tube in my bedroom.  It was easy to attach the stand to the TV (including the screwdriver was a great touch), all inputs/outputs were clearly marked and labeled, and I had no trouble hooking up my set-top cable and Roku boxes.  The color and sound settings needed to be adjusted, but that wasn't difficult.  I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the low price
Reviews.Author: Joe C
Reviews.Content: This isn't a TV you'll want in your main room, but it'll do fine for a guest room or play room.  The picture isn't great, it's ok, but for the price you can't beat it.  The low price is really the greatest part of the tv.  I also got the 40" and the picture is much better.  The sound is fine  The only annoying thing is the aspect ratio.  With my Samsung tv I'll leave the aspect ratio in normal and it would automatically widen the screen when it gets an HD channel, not so with this you'd have to do it manually.All I all, for the price it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Worth the cheap buy.
Reviews.Author: William Bernsen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv during a cyber Monday lighting deal for 119$ and am very pleased with it. I was aware it's a cheap tv when I bought it so the reviews are true, you can get better sound quality from an iPad speaker. So had I payed normal sales price which is about 179$ I would have been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: Have not hooked it up yet but for the price I am not expecting it to be theater quality viewing. Bought for spare room to watch when the guys are over and I did not want to spend a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Easy, good picture.
Reviews.Author: Victoria Lynn Plummer
Reviews.Content: Light and easy to set up. Great picture and depth, got it on the Cyber Monday deal and am happy with the product'

Reviews.Title: no complaints...good price
Reviews.Author: JLS
Reviews.Content: Good quality for the price...the sound is not the best but most are assumed to hook up to external sound anyway so no biggie. Overall, price, shipping,and quality are very good.

Reviews.Title: Works beautifully for the price!
Reviews.Author: Orlando De La Paz
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on the date provided really fast for being free shipping. It looks and works perfectly for what i'm using it which is to replace a smaller second PC monitor. I'mm really happy with it and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: good tv for price
Reviews.Author: Wayne O'Rear
Reviews.Content: Bought on here on black friday special for my parents. The love it, a rather good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: It does what it suppose to for a bedroom TV, Plus the remote is Roku streaming stick ready,Only thing is that Roku needs to get the stick price down to the cost of the the box prices./It's very light so you will need to mount it

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Valc
Reviews.Content: When i first received the TV and plugged it in, it had an odd smell like rubber burning.  I was going to send it back but after a few days it wore off.  I have no complaints about the TV itself.  I am please with it.

Reviews.Title: Does not have a code for Dish Network
Reviews.Author: Great North Woods Jeeper
Reviews.Content: The television is fine except for the fact there is no code to connect it with Dish Network.  Unless it is connected directly to the receiver, it can't be used.  This TV is now useless to us in our son's room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: joe panoc
Reviews.Content: Clear picture and plenty of hook-ups in the rear of the TV. The sound is OK but nothing to write home about. I hooked it up to my surround sound and it sounds great.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Michael Joseph Gentile
Reviews.Content: This TV is a bargain.  I have only had it a month but so far so good.  Picture is as good as any 32" I have seen. Its comparable to Sony, Samsung etc. for half the price.  It is super light and easy to set up.  I plan on mounting it soon so the 11lb weight will make it easy.  I imagine it is fragile,as are most flat panel tvs, so I am going to be gentile with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal and Great TV - Likely Made by Sony
Reviews.Author: Virginia Lawyer and Wife
Reviews.Content: I bought this on Black Friday for about $150 and I would probably pay $225-$250 for it otherwise.Pros:  The screen clarity and definition are fantastic, and I have experienced no glare issues.  The TV is mounted to he bedroom wall and replaced an existing old TV.  It has four screw holes on the back of the TV for the bracket(sold separately), and the pattern is one of the standard configurations.  Installation was a snap.  It came with a base but I obviously didn't need it.  The TV has 3 USB ports on the bottom of it, as well as the power cord come from the bottom, which made wall installation nice.  I used 2 of the ports, one for the Verizon cable box and the other one for my Apple TV.  This thing is plug and play with great instructions for all kinds of setups.  When I went to program my Verizon universal remote, the TV instructions told me to use Sony programming codes, thus why I think Sony is the actual manufacturer.CONS:  None.  Best TV purchase I have made and the great price made it that much sweeter.There is some kind of wireless accessory you can purchase for it as well ( there is a coupon inside the box) but I have not looked into it yet but it sounds like it allows you to receive a bunch of channels for free or at least cheaply. One of the USB ports is specifically designed for that wireless device, but it also works as a regular USB port too.

Reviews.Title: All-around sub-par product
Reviews.Author: M. TROUTMAN
Reviews.Content: I picked this up on a black-friday special, and even with how much I saved, I still regret the purchase.As noted in other reviews, the sound comes out very "tinny", and be careful with selecting this as a bedroom tv, because even volume level "1" is a bit louder than some may be comfortable falling asleep to.Speaking of falling asleep, this tv apparently has trouble with that.  Although equipped with a sleep timer, ours has randomly been deciding NOT to turn itself off when the timer ends.  So you wake up in the middle of the night to some annoying infomercial and have to struggle to turn the thing off with the remote.Speaking of the remote... just terrible.  The tv often doesn't recognize button presses, which makes all of the above even harder to deal with.I'm working on pursuing a warrant claim, or testing the limits of Amazon's return policy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Erichsen
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for the study or bedroom where you are not too close to it.  Since its 720p  you don't need a 1080p like in your living room to notice any difference in picture quality.  Plus its LED versus LCD which I have in my living room.

Reviews.Title: President Obama's Christmas Ornament
Reviews.Author: Albert L. Owens "Uncle Butch"
Reviews.Content: I love it when I wake up in the mooring and Barack Obama is my President.I don't mind responding. What I do mind is someone telling me how many words to use. There are quite a few single words in the English language that that can express how someone feels about something.Until you fix this this will be my last replyThank you,Al OwensPS:  Is that enough words????????????

Reviews.Title: mmmm
Reviews.Author: Metin
Reviews.Content: The remote controller got broken after just 2 days of usage, i mean, we did even watch TV so much...

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Rosenberg
Reviews.Content: Great, product, picture, and price!!  What a deal!!  This was a replacement to a wall mounted tube style 27" TV on our lanai.  This has a bigger picture and only weighs 15 pounds - much safer for wall mounting!  Picture is visible from all angles which is terrific from any seat at the patio table or from in the pool.  Would definitely purchase again.

Reviews.Title: one thing would make it beter
Reviews.Author: Mac scott leggett
Reviews.Content: Everything about the tv is fine and what I expected.The only thing that would have made it better is if it would have programmed to my satallite service so I could operate it with one remote instead of two.

Reviews.Title: Good Price - Not Blown Away
Reviews.Author: HD
Reviews.Content: Shipped and received super quick.  The picture isn't crisp, however the price was excellent for a 32", so I couldn't pass it up.  It's good enough for me.  The worst thing about the TV is the remote control - it's very cheap and the buttons really stink.

Reviews.Title: Great...but
Reviews.Author: zoziank
Reviews.Content: This was a wonderful television for the price, once we got one with sound.  The first one's sound was inoperable, but Amazon made the return so easy, which is one reason I come back to them for purchases again and again.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality!
Reviews.Author: jacob
Reviews.Content: This is a great quality priduct. The picture is great, and so is the sound. I was skeptic due to the reviews, but the sound is as good if not better than the samsung and Vizio we have in our house. I would reccomend it!

Reviews.Title: It is not working properly
Reviews.Author: Sharon Bryan
Reviews.Content: I would like to return it but I want the replacement in hand and working properly before returning this item

Reviews.Title: wished i would have bought a different brand
Reviews.Author: Stacie Sanders
Reviews.Content: My first one that came in was defected. The sound went in and out and there were already those digital type spots on the screen. My replacement came in a very timely manner. The problem with the second one is: 1-the stand on this one was so hard to put on. It really took me a half hour to screw 5-6 screws and I still wasn't able to get them all the way tight. 2-where the cable wire insert is, it was almost impossible to get it plugged in. Had to lay the tv down flat and bend the cable wire just to get the darn thing to screw in. Next time I will spend the $10 and get a better brand television set.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: christian
Reviews.Content: First few uses was great, after some time it seems like the screen has not the same resolution.Not very pleased!!

Reviews.Title: a gift for my boy
Reviews.Author: Lisa Perez
Reviews.Content: Pretty good so far the picture is amazing.My son really enjoy playing his PlayStation game on the tv and watching movies

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV GREAT QUALITY GREAT PICTURE
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Howland
Reviews.Content: THIS TV WORKS GREAT MY MOTHER IN LAW LOVE IT GREAT PICTURE GREAT SOUND OVERALL VERY NICE TV FOR THE PRICE I LOVE IT AND SHE LOVES IT THANK YOU !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Toan Truong
Reviews.Content: It was the cheapest deal I could find on a TV around black Friday online. It works, that's about all I can say. The picture isn't very good, and the sound will boom or bust with each channel change. Also speaking of channel changing the remote is very very cheap and doesn't work well, I would recommend a $10 universal remote in its place as a much better option. Given the opportunity to do this transaction again I would not. It is well worth it to pay $30-$40 more for a 32 inch Samsung equivalent.

Reviews.Title: Great Black Friday Deal
Reviews.Author: MAP
Reviews.Content: I might have been less happy with this TV if it had not been on a very good Black Friday sale. The picture is great, the controls are fine, hooking it up is easy, mounting it was fine -- but the sound wasn't great. The sound was OK and could work for a smaller room but just lacked depth. We ended up purchasing an oCosmo sound bar and are very happy with the sound now -- just hate that another purchase was needed..... Using an LG Blu-Ray player with it and it is all good with both Blu-Ray and regular DVDs. The picture is just fine and I'm happy with the purchase - just could have had better sound. Maybe all TVs (or budget TVs) are being made with substandard sound? Otherwise why would there be so many sound bars and "home theatre" systems out there?I wish I had purchased more than 1 when the price was super low.

Reviews.Title: Good for gamming or children's room but
Reviews.Author: drew
Reviews.Content: Watching tv i would recommend a Samsung  when the backround light is dark  the picture looks blury but the the price is fair

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!! Great value!
Reviews.Author: Alan Huang
Reviews.Content: This LED TV is awesome! You can go through different modes such as movies, power saving, etc.. Let's just say I can't sleep without it =)

Reviews.Title: Nice tv for the price
Reviews.Author: tbrnottb
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv for our spare room and it actually works very well, the price was fantastic and the quality is a lot better than expected for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Really nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Notamrngperson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV during a Lightening Deal on Amazon. I had never heard of the brand, but it was such a great price, I had to check it out. After arriving, it was easy to set up and the picture and audio quality are really great. It doesn't have the high resolution of a 1080dpi TV, but for a bedroom, it's great. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: I like the TV and like the price
Reviews.Author: mick
Reviews.Content: Received the TV today, it works great and the picture is very clear for a 720.  Problem is I tried to set up my Cable TV remote with this TV and Charter does not show a code to set up their remote, so I have to still use two separate remotes to control the TV and the cable box.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied with the support
Reviews.Author: nazih j hemiadan
Reviews.Content: no support at all from your techwill not buy another one ,tried to get help but it seems the people you had have no idea

Reviews.Title: nice buy
Reviews.Author: christian
Reviews.Content: for the buck you get a pretty good bang the picture is good soumd not so much but i have a sweet sound bar so wasnt a problem for me i do love the tv though i use it for my gaming and it works just fine for that.

Reviews.Title: Original unit did not work.  Replacement does work.
Reviews.Author: dirk
Reviews.Content: shipping was amazingly fast.  however the picture was upside down and the sound does not work.  i hope this is not an indication of poor quality control.  the replacement process seems to be painless and well implemented; i hope i get the new one just as quickly.  I will update the review at that timeUpdate:  the replacement tv works.  the picture is very good and the sound is also good (much, much better than the sound on dynex, the best buy store brand tvs).  it helps to adjust the sound settings and turn off surround sound.  overall, i am impressed with the tv.This ocosmo tv seems to be manufactured by sceptre, or the same company that makes sceptre tvs.  the packaging, remote and on screen menus are very similar to a sceptre tv.Update 2, PC via VGA and RCA:  this tv is finicky about displaying input from a pc with a vga cable.  the only way i could get it to work was to set the pc screen resolution, then have the tv powered on and the source set as pc, both before you power on the pc.  then turn on the pc and the tv will pick up the input.  when the tv does pick up the display input, it may or may not get sound from the rca jack. it is hit or miss? i havent figured this out yet.  if you change the channel, or turn off the tv, then you will have to start over and turn your pc off and restart.  very strange as i've never had any problem with other tvs.  they have always just displayed pc input automatically and easily.  i assume that this problem is for vga/rca input only.  i havent tested it yet, but hdmi input from pc should work fine.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: L. Norman
Reviews.Content: I should have known with the bargain price that this would be a below par tv.  Maybe the one I received was defective but the picture was very pixel-ly (if that is a word) and gave us a headache after watching just a few minutes.  We are returning it.

Reviews.Title: returned it
Reviews.Author: Todd Michael Nugent
Reviews.Content: because she determined that it was TOO big for her workout room requirements. never even took it out of the box....

Reviews.Title: terrible TV
Reviews.Author: Rachel Maggert
Reviews.Content: remote -- can only work 2-1/2 to 3 feet from the TV and has no input button on it so if you are planning to use antenna forget it.never did get it to work with the antenna!!!difficult to figure the remote out. and turn it to DVD/ VHSwould not buy it again for sure!

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: EA "kmeg248"
Reviews.Content: The sound quality on this television is poor at best.  If you don't mind using a sound bar you may be ok.  However, you will also have to use a different remote because the signal is poor as well.  The picture quality is decent for the price, however I would recommend paying the extra $50-100 for a better quality television.

Reviews.Title: The remote must be lifted in line-sight to operate TV
Reviews.Author: Robert  Batson
Reviews.Content: The tag line above is huge, our dresser is higher than our bed and it's really dumb to have to extend your arm up and aim to change the channel.  Half asleep or just settled in and you practically have to get out of bed to change the tv.  EVerything else seems fine and I would have given it a four except for this garbage.

Reviews.Title: great picture for the price bad cheap sound
Reviews.Author: John Dyess
Reviews.Content: Picture as good as any but the sound is low volume and and confused sounding. Picture is very good. It does have a headphone jack so I may attach to external pc speakers

Reviews.Title: OK TV, no HDMI port functionality
Reviews.Author: Mari Foster
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is OK, not great. When I went to link my laptop to the HDMI hook-ups, I got a black screen. So I tried a few basic fixes (switched ports, adjusted the resolution on the laptop, switched laptops, etc.) Eventually I got so frustrated I had to call tech support. Not sure who I talked to (I think I heard a baby crying in the background?) but he kept telling me it was my fault, I didn't understand the TV, and there was no fixing the problem I was experiencing because he'd never heard of that problem before.If we can't figure this out on our own, we're returning this TV and going with a name brand. Sorry oCOSMO, but with bad customer service behind a TV that doesn't work properly, you are not off to a good start.

Reviews.Title: a piece of s***
Reviews.Author: ethan verrett
Reviews.Content: It is a piece of crap. You get what you pay for. The remote sucks. You have to aim just right to make it work.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Kaela
Reviews.Content: Very cheap, picture is awful, sound is awful and DirecTV does not recognize the brand of television, therefore you cannot program the remote. Definitely returning this .

Reviews.Title: 32 inches sure...not quite.
Reviews.Author: Steven D Trezzo
Reviews.Content: Sounds quality very poor. Size was not as expected. Wish I could return but I will just use elsewhere in the house.

Reviews.Title: Shatter screen
Reviews.Author: Alec Carroll
Reviews.Content: Came with a broken screen, so it didn't work at all. Really excited for it but was disappointed on the outcome.

Reviews.Title: DOA --- Dead on Arrival!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Rus Robinson"
Reviews.Content: !!!Buyer Beware!!!Mine will not power on... and I still have to pay the cable guy for his visit!Fortunately, Amazon stepped right up and has shipped me another and I'll send this dead unit back!

Reviews.Title: Disgrassful delivary
Reviews.Author: Liz R
Reviews.Content: Order as Christmas gift. Left on front door porch NOT EVEN IN A SHIPPING BOX! Just like you would pull of shelf in a store. Original box. It was raining. No signature was even asked for or door bell wrung. Completely ruined a BIG surprise for my daughter, Not to mention left there 1 day before Christmas and fully visible to be stolen.

Reviews.Title: Best product for the money
Reviews.Author: jose g jimenez
Reviews.Content: Talk about getting bang for your buck. The picture is great quality and deserves the 5 star rating. The only thing that is underwhelming is the sound. If you are buying this product you also have to buy the sound bar that comes with it. Other than that though, there aren't enough words to express my satisfaction with this product. I would recommend this television to anyone looking to save money and get a quality product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: Great! I got this for my room and it has very good resolution. Clear picture and easy to use. Good sound too. For the price it is a great buy.
